Title: Fashion PR
Description: ALOHAS is more than a fashion brand: it’s a responsible shopping experience and a chance to participate in the fight against overproduction in fashion.  Working at ALOHAS is being part of the innovation and growth of a Spanish start-up with a young, creative and proactive team, good communication and a high level of energy! It’s demanding but extremely rewarding due to an environment where we take pride in learning from one another and strive to make sustainability a way of life beyond the workplace.  In a nutshell, we love what we do and it shows! 😀   THE ROLE  We are looking for of highly organized, communicative, and eager PR team to join ALOHAS and cover different markets (USA, Europe, Australia) The ideal candidates are passionate, industry savvy, and has a track record of building brand awareness through the press and celebrity/influencer landscape specifically in the fashion, beauty, and home spaces. These people must be a self-starter, a hard worker, and excited to bring new ideas to the team.   YOUR CHALLENGE:  Nurture and drive qualitative relationships with influencer/celebrity networks to ensure strong coverage and further develop brand awareness in the region. Support key PR projects. Responsible for KPI tracking and reporting WoW,MoM. Identify key trends and watch the scene to take part in any/every relevant opportunities Ensure PR exposure is capitalized among departments.   YOU WILL ROCK AT THIS ROLE IF:  Fluent/Native English speaker  Local language and knowledge (in each region) Other languages is a plus 6 months to 2 years of experience in PR (agency work or with a client) Positive and curious Interested in culture, art, and fashion Committed to excellence and detail-oriented Dynamic and proactive, resilient with a can-do attitude   Benefits of being part of ALOHAS  - Culture of freedom, diversity & inclusion, and responsibility ✨ - Flexible schedule: Fit it into your routine! ⏰ - Discounts: Our team has special discounts 💯 and we do not forget their friends either! - Office: In the heart of Barcelona, in the Gracia neighbourhood, where we take care of coffee ☕ and fruit 🍎 - Work remotely: live and work wherever you want 🌍 within the CET time zone! - Home office setup: Get a laptop + electronic devices like a keyboard, mouse, and screen 💻 - Keep learning with ALOHAS 🎓 We offer English courses to our employees, more languages coming soon! - We take care of the happiness 🌈 and the professional growth of our workers with constructive feedback 💪 - After-work meetings every month 🎉     Ready for the challenge?🚀     About ALOHAS  Want to know more? Video Presentation Apply with us: careers.alohas.io Our product: alohas.io/ IG: @alohas
Industry: Industria textil y moda para la venta minorista

Title: Frontend Developer (React.js) - 100% Remote
Description: Frontend Developer (React.js) - 100% Remote - Data visualisation|International company specialized in Data visualisation solutions.     About Our Client     Our client main goal is Data visualisation and innovation projects through software development.     They have more than 15 years of experience and more than 30 engineers. They work in a flexible schedule and even if they have offices in Barcelona city centre, they allow 100% remote work on Spain.     Job Description     Translate technical requirements into technical solutions. Understand and create new feattures with React.js. Work also on R&D tasks in order to find the best technical solution for your work. Assure the delivery of the tasks with your team. Combine your work with other teams and departments. The Successful Applicant     Front-end Developer with at least 2.5-3 years of experience in the same role. 1-2 years of experience with React.js. Experience with other frameworks like Angular or Vue.js will be appreciated but not necessary. Fluency with JavaScript or Typescript. Interest on R&D or Data Visualisation. What's on Offer     Salary budget: 35K-40K Remote: 100%. Laptop and screen Contact: Pierre Rivenc     Quote job ref: JN-012023-5908516

Title: Send us your CV
Description: Can't see the perfect role for you? We'd still love to hear from you!     Please tell us also what kind of role you're looking for and the skills you'd bring to the team.     We'll then keep your profile in our system and get in touch if a role comes up that could be a good fit.     But again, this is only for spontaneous approaches when there's no job matching your profile advertised on our career page. Be sure to check there first.     Looking forward to hearing from you!     Nuvolar Talent Team

Title: Meet & Greeter - Valencia
Description: About Us     GuestReady is a globally leading short-term rental management and hospitality company, providing great services to property owners, and amazing stays to guests. We are currently operating in the United Kingdom, France, Portugal, Spain and the United Arab Emirates, and we're growing fast. Launched in 2016, with over 3.3 million guest nights sold, generating over $170 million in Gross Booking Value and managing a portfolio worth over $1 billion, GuestReady is a company on the rise.     At GuestReady, our purpose is to revolutionise the short-term rental industry through innovative technology and a commitment to hospitality. We empower landlords to turn their investments into profitable sources of income by streamlining the rental process from start to finish. From creating listings across multiple platforms to managing guest communications, housekeeping, key exchange, and price optimisation, our team of experts handle every aspect of the rental experience, freeing landlords from the hassle and stress of property management. Our mission is to bring the tradition of hospitality to the short-term rental market and provide peace of mind for our valued clients.     We are looking to hire a freelance meet and greeter who can check our guests into our properties across Valencia and assist guests in the fields (for example, helping with deliveries). This is flexible work - the check-ins are paid on a per job basis.     The job requires the following:     A presentable and friendly person, ideally with experience working in customer service/ hospitality. Willing to travel to homes in various locations around Valencia. Local knowledge of tourist activities, bars and restaurants. Reliable and trustworthy as you will be carrying keys to our homes. Able to explain how to use appliances and heating in the home. Able to troubleshoot appliances and heating/ hot water if there are minor problems, with simple repair skills. Flexible working hours. We currently check guests into homes between the hours of 11am-12 midnight, every day of the week. Ideally a fan of the sharing economy and Airbnb platform.     This job will suit a freelance worker or university student who has a flexible schedule and is looking to earn some extra money.     Please send me a brief response outlining your interest, your availability and other commitments and why we should hire you!     We encourage you to apply even if you are missing a skill or two! Don't undervalue yourself and miss out on an incredible opportunity even though you are a 70% fit- a lot of things can be learned through experience, and skills can be transferable. Let's work together to fill the gaps!     Diversity and Inclusion     GuestReady is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect and inclusion to our teams all over the world. We are proud to say we have a diverse team spread globally and value the unique talents of all our people, with different personal experiences and points of view. We do not accept any discrimination on the basis of race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, culture, and warmly welcome applications from members of underrepresented groups.

Title: Sales Engineer (Southern Europe)
Description: The Company     Fortanix® is a data-first multi cloud security company solving the challenges of cloud security and privacy. Data is the most precious digital asset of businesses, but this data is spread across clouds, SaaS, applications, storage systems, and data centers. Security teams struggle to track, much less secure it. Fortanix empowers customers to secure all this data with a centralized solution. Its pioneering Confidential Computing technology means data remains protected at-rest, in-motion, and in-use, keeping it secure from even the most sophisticated attacks.     We are looking for an experienced Sales Engineer responsible for selling into new prospects as well as farming back into existing customers for high renewals and to keep customer satisfaction levels at all-time high. Successful candidates will have at least 7 years of experience as an enterprise sales engineer with infrastructure, cloud, or security vendors, and would be accountable for revenue goals driven by innovative technical programs and day-to-day customer-facing account-level activities. Ideal candidates also are driven by success, are highly energetic with strong hands-on skills, and embody the “can-do” attitude. This critical role will have close interactions primarily with Sales, and will extend to Product Management, Customer Success, Engineering, as well as external stakeholders such as customers and partners.     You will:     You will be part of the Fortanix Sales Engineering organization focused on the following outcomes: Drive revenue goals through close alignment to company’s revenue targets: Evangelize Fortanix products to prospects, customers and partners via presentations and demonstrations Work closely with prospects early in the sales process to gain deep understanding of their technical requirements and propose how best to address them through the unique Fortanix solution / portfolio Provide technical leadership in the analysis, design and development of a fully integrated technology solution for prospects and existing customers based on their business challenges Respond to functional and technical requirements in RFIs/RFPs Successfully lead, manage and execute technical Proof-Of-Concepts (POCs), on-premises or via remotely Deliver technical training and/or conduct technical workshops for prospects, customers and partners Understand and document market feedback to guide new product enhancements / features: “Be the voice” of the customer to Fortanix internal stakeholders on technical enhancements / new features Liaise with Product Management, Customer Success, Engineering and Marketing to provider consultative technical expertise based on customer’s requirements Customer Service Respond to and liaise with Customer Success teams to manage any customer related technical issues Discover potential up-sell opportunities from new requirements / business challenges through regular feedback sessions with customer     Requirements     Requirements: Proven work experience of 7+ years as a Sales Engineer Experience selling and implementing Enterprise Software, Security Platforms, Cloud Platforms (IaaS/PaaS), or Virtual Infrastructure Track record in selling into enterprises, including $1M+ deals and or selling to Global 500 / Financial Services companies Familiar with various operating systems (Windows/Linux) Familiar with at least one programming or scripting language (e.g. C/C++, Python, Perl, GoLang, Rust, Shell scripting) Domain expertise in IT Operations with one or more of the following systems: Virtualization (VMWare, Hyper-V, KVM) Cloud Service Providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) Microservices (Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift) Databases (Oracle, MongoDB, MySQL, Microsoft SQL, DB2, Informix) Storage (NetApp, HDS, Dell/EMC) Backup and Recovery (COMMVAULT, Veritas, Cohesity, Rubrik) Ability to forge strong, long-lasting relationships with “technical champions” Ability to navigate, organize and analyze any sales-level obstacles using creative and adaptive techniques Excellent written and oral communications skills in Spanish, French and English Excellent communication skills with peers and non-technical people Comfortable in conducting technical and business presentations to small and larger groups of audience Comfortable conducting the business meetings with CxO level audience Comfortable working for a dynamic technical organization with a fast-growing customer base Previous experience working for a dynamic and young organization is a plus Experience working with data security solutions is a plus Expertise in various “crypto” interfaces (PKCS#11, CAPI, CNG, JCE, KMIP, etc…) is highly regarded, but not mandatory Experience or knowledge in Confidential Computing is highly regarded, but not mandatory

Title: Meet & Greeter - Madrid
Description: About Us     GuestReady is a globally leading short-term rental management and hospitality company, providing great services to property owners, and amazing stays to guests. We are currently operating in the United Kingdom, France, Portugal, Spain and the United Arab Emirates, and we're growing fast. Launched in 2016, with over 3.3 million guest nights sold, generating over $170 million in Gross Booking Value and managing a portfolio worth over $1 billion, GuestReady is a company on the rise. Willing to travel in Madrid to homes in various locations - car or motorcycle is mandatory. Local knowledge of tourist activities, bars and restaurants. Reliable and trustworthy as you will be carrying keys to our homes. Able to explain how to use appliances and heating in the home. Let's work together to fill the gaps!     Diversity and Inclusion     GuestReady is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect and inclusion to our teams all over the world. We are proud to say we have a diverse team spread globally and value the unique talents of all our people, with different personal experiences and points of view. We do not accept any discrimination on the basis of race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, culture, and warmly welcome applications from members of underrepresented groups.

Title: Director of Communications
Description: Director of Communications: the person who will redefine the perception of open source in the enterprise. Canonical, the publisher of Ubuntu and a leader in open source solutions and services, is writing the next chapter of its growth story: offering the widest open source portfolio, redefining its corporate image and becoming a public company. We are looking for an exceptional storyteller, tech enthusiast and writer to drive Canonical brands and influence along this journey.     Ubuntu is used by millions of developers from Calcutta to California, a name associated with productivity, security and ease of use. Our communications team is crafting the narrative for the Canonical brand and its portfolio of products, shaping our responses to industry events and trends, providing strategic input to executives on a range of industry and public relations topics. This role reports to the VP of marketing and manages a team of press relations, analyst relations and social media professionals.     Location: In this role, you can work remotely from any country across EMEA.     Key responsibilities:     Define Canonical's corporate and product portfolio narrative Lead a team of professionals and agencies to bring this story to life Orchestrate message across channels (AR, PR, social…) to drive awareness Build credibility and relevance across the business and enterprise Foster passion and engagement across developer and open source communities     We value:     Experience of leadership and mentoring in a multi-channel comms team Story telling that weaves corporate and product portfolio narratives The ability to motivate and influence at all levels of the organisation Personal engagement with journalists, analysts, investors and executives The vision to lead on brand awareness and thought leadership Passion for technology and technology evangelism Excellent academic results, with Bachelor's or equivalent in Communications, Humanities, or STEM Commitment to continuous learning, feedback and improvement Engagement with the latest innovations in communications     The communications team operates across technologies, verticals and regions, from operating systems to SAAS, from telco to automotive, from silicon vendors to systems Integrators. They build brand awareness and thought leadership while maintaining cohesion and consistency in messaging and tone of voice across channels.     What We Offer     An opportunity to shape an iconic brand, company and products Influence in the open source community An inclusive work environment Flexibility to work remotely from home Personal learning and development budget Annual compensation review Recognition rewards Annual leave Parental Leave Employee Assistance Program Priority Pass for for International travel     Canonical is a growing international software company that works with the open-source community to deliver Ubuntu, the world's best free software platform. Our services help businesses worldwide reduce costs, improve efficiency and enhance security with Ubuntu.     We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity we will give your application fair consideration.

Title: Scrum Master - 100% remoto - ESPAÑA
Description: En SlashMobility estamos buscando un/a Scrum Máster. Se trata de un proyecto estable, de larga duración y full remote para colaborar con una de las principales empresas del sector detail del mundo.  ¿Quiénes Somos?   Somos una empresa de Soluciones Mobile Corporate, cuya misión está centrada en acelerar la digitalización tecnológica de la sociedad mediante servicios Mobile 360º. Desde 2010 nos hemos convertido en una empresa referente en el mercado mediante el desarrollo software, formación y captación de talento digital, en este tiempo ha sido el lugar donde más de 70 personas han hecho realidad más de 1000 proyectos para 150 clientes con presencia nacional e internacional como FC.Barcelona, Inditex, UFV, etc.  ¿En qué creemos?   Nos basamos en cuatro valores fundamentales:  Innovación, ofreciendo soluciones innovadoras de una manera profesional y rentable con un valor diferencial: el conocimiento experto en toda la cadena de valor.  Compromiso ya que llevamos como propios los objetivos de la organización y superamos cualquier obstáculo para lograrlos.  Proactividad, proveyendo y realizando acciones para mejorar sus servicios y calidad.  Trabajo en equipo, contando con un equipo motivado y multidisciplinar que trabaja en perfecta coordinación para lograr los objetivos comunes.  Funciones que realizarás en tu día a día Fomentar la implantación de los valores y principios Agile a través de sus métodos y herramientas para fomentar un buen ambiente de trabajo con equipos auto-gestionados. Desbloquear impedimentos. Ayudar al Product Owner en la creación y mantenimiento del backlog de los equipos, refinado y priorizado. Ayudar a los equipos de desarrollo facilitando eventos Scrum y Kanban. Dar seguimiento de las métricas definidas en el proyecto. Ayudar a los equipos a definir e implementar acciones de mejora continua. Ayudar en algunas tareas de gestión. En cuanto al proyecto   Se trata de un proyecto para un empresa lider en el sector retail, que ha continuado una evolución constante y dinámica. Cuyos valores más destacados son el inconformismo y el emprendimiento.  ¿Te gustaría saber más?  ¡No dejes pasar la oportunidad!  Nerea Berraco  Técnico de Selección en SlashMobility  www.slashmobility.com  Requisitos:  Experiencia con métodos y herramientas Agile. Conocimientos de Scrum, Kanban y Lean. Background técnico, bien sea por la experiencia o por el contexto en anteriores puestos. Resolución de conflictos. Conocimientos de Jira. Experiencia en implementación y seguimiento de métricas. Mindset agile, sentido común y entrega de valor sobre dogmas.
Industry: Servicios y tecnologías de la información

Title: Meet & Greeter - Marbella
Description: About Us     GuestReady is a globally leading short-term rental management and hospitality company, providing great services to property owners, and amazing stays to guests. We are currently operating in the United Kingdom, France, Portugal, Spain and the United Arab Emirates, and we're growing fast. Launched in 2016, with over 3.3 million guest nights sold, generating over $170 million in Gross Booking Value and managing a portfolio worth over $1 billion, GuestReady is a company on the rise.     At GuestReady, our purpose is to revolutionise the short-term rental industry through innovative technology and a commitment to hospitality. We empower landlords to turn their investments into profitable sources of income by streamlining the rental process from start to finish. From creating listings across multiple platforms to managing guest communications, housekeeping, key exchange, and price optimisation, our team of experts handle every aspect of the rental experience, freeing landlords from the hassle and stress of property management. Our mission is to bring the tradition of hospitality to the short-term rental market and provide peace of mind for our valued clients.     We are looking to hire a freelance meet and greeter who can check our guests into our properties around Marbella and assist guests in the field (for example, helping with deliveries). This is flexible work where the check ins are paid on a per job basis.     The job requires the following:     A presentable and friendly person, ideally having experience working in customer service/ hospitality Willing to travel Marbella to homes in various locations - car or motorcycle is mandatory Local knowledge of tourist activities, bars and restaurants Reliable and trustworthy as you will be carrying keys to our homes Able to explain how to use appliances and heating in the home Able to troubleshoot appliances and heating/ hot water if there are minor problems and simple repair skills. Flexible working hours. We currently check guests into homes usually between the hours of 8am-12 midnight, all days of the week. Ideally a fan of the sharing economy and Airbnb platform.     This job will suit a freelance worker or university student who has a flexible schedule and is looking to earn some extra money.     Please send me a brief response outlining your interest, your availability and other commitments and why we should hire you!     We encourage you to apply even if you are missing a skill or two! Don't undervalue yourself and miss out on an incredible opportunity even though you are a 70% fit- a lot of things can be learned through experience, and skills can be transferable. Let's work together to fill the gaps!     Diversity and Inclusion     GuestReady is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect and inclusion to our teams all over the world. We are proud to say we have a diverse team spread globally and value the unique talents of all our people, with different personal experiences and points of view. We do not accept any discrimination on the basis of race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, culture, and warmly welcome applications from members of underrepresented groups.

Title: Director of Communications
Description: Director of Communications: the person who will redefine the perception of open source in the enterprise. Canonical, the publisher of Ubuntu and a leader in open source solutions and services, is writing the next chapter of its growth story: offering the widest open source portfolio, redefining its corporate image and becoming a public company. We are looking for an exceptional storyteller, tech enthusiast and writer to drive Canonical brands and influence along this journey.     Ubuntu is used by millions of developers from Calcutta to California, a name associated with productivity, security and ease of use. Our communications team is crafting the narrative for the Canonical brand and its portfolio of products, shaping our responses to industry events and trends, providing strategic input to executives on a range of industry and public relations topics. This role reports to the VP of marketing and manages a team of press relations, analyst relations and social media professionals.     Location: In this role, you can work remotely from any country across EMEA.     Key responsibilities:     Define Canonical's corporate and product portfolio narrative Lead a team of professionals and agencies to bring this story to life Orchestrate message across channels (AR, PR, social…) to drive awareness Build credibility and relevance across the business and enterprise Foster passion and engagement across developer and open source communities     We value:     Experience of leadership and mentoring in a multi-channel comms team Story telling that weaves corporate and product portfolio narratives The ability to motivate and influence at all levels of the organisation Personal engagement with journalists, analysts, investors and executives The vision to lead on brand awareness and thought leadership Passion for technology and technology evangelism Excellent academic results, with Bachelor's or equivalent in Communications, Humanities, or STEM Commitment to continuous learning, feedback and improvement Engagement with the latest innovations in communications     The communications team operates across technologies, verticals and regions, from operating systems to SAAS, from telco to automotive, from silicon vendors to systems Integrators. They build brand awareness and thought leadership while maintaining cohesion and consistency in messaging and tone of voice across channels.     What We Offer     An opportunity to shape an iconic brand, company and products Influence in the open source community An inclusive work environment Flexibility to work remotely from home Personal learning and development budget Annual compensation review Recognition rewards Annual leave Parental Leave Employee Assistance Program Priority Pass for for International travel     Canonical is a growing international software company that works with the open-source community to deliver Ubuntu, the world's best free software platform. Our services help businesses worldwide reduce costs, improve efficiency and enhance security with Ubuntu.     We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity we will give your application fair consideration.

Title: Project Manager ERP (50% remoto)
Description: Importante empresa tecnológica (Partner Microsoft)|Trabajo remoto (50% remoto)     About Our Client     Estamos buscando un Project Manager de ERP altamente motivado y experimentado para unirse a nuestro equipo. La capacidad para comunicarse efectivamente en inglés es imprescindible, ya que trabajamos con clientes internacionales.     Job Description     Entre las funciones a desarrollar durante el desempeño de tu rol destacarían:     Gestionar y liderar proyectos de implementación de ERP desde la fase inicial hasta la entrega final, asegurando el cumplimiento de los plazos y la calidad del proyecto. Colaborar estrechamente con los clientes para comprender sus necesidades y requisitos comerciales específicos. Coordinar y dirigir a los equipos de desarrollo y consultoría para garantizar una implementación exitosa del sistema ERP. Realizar la planificación estratégica de los proyectos, incluida la asignación de recursos, la definición de hitos y la gestión del presupuesto. Supervisar el progreso del proyecto y comunicarse de manera proactiva con los interesados internos y externos, brindando actualizaciones regulares sobre el estado del proyecto. Identificar y mitigar los riesgos potenciales que puedan surgir durante el ciclo de vida del proyecto. Brindar orientación y apoyo técnico a los equipos de implementación y ofrecer soluciones efectivas a los desafíos técnicos y empresariales. Realizar seguimiento y evaluación posteriores a la implementación para garantizar la satisfacción del cliente y la mejora continua de los procesos. The Successful Applicant     Al menos 2 años de experiencia en la implementación de software ERP, preferiblemente con experiencia en soluciones de Microsoft. Fuerte comprensión de los principios y prácticas de gestión de proyectos. Habilidades demostradas en la planificación, organización y seguimiento de proyectos complejos. Excelentes habilidades de comunicación y capacidad para interactuar de manera efectiva con clientes y equipos internos en un entorno multicultural. Dominio del idioma inglés, tanto escrito como hablado. Capacidad para trabajar de forma autónoma y tomar decisiones informadas. Certificaciones en gestión de proyectos (por ejemplo, PMP) serán consideradas como una ventaja adicional. What's on Offer     Oportunidad de trabajar en una empresa tecnológica líder y socio de Microsoft, con proyectos importantes y emocionantes. Trabajo remoto 100%, lo que te brinda flexibilidad y comodidad. Entorno colaborativo y de aprendizaje continuo. Oportunidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional. Remuneración competitiva y beneficios adicionales. Salario competitivo. Contrato indefinido. Benefits Contact: Tildo Muxart Gonzalez     Quote job ref: JN-062023-6099988

Title: Business Development Representative - Spain based
Description: Si te gustan las ventas, la inteligencia artificial, las metas, un estupendo ambiente de trabajo y buscas un crecimiento acelerado, ¡echa un vistazo a esta vacante! Estamos buscando un talento, a alguien que le guste el arte de persuadir y que quiera desarrollar sus habilidades en ventas para formar nuestro selecto equipo de Ventas EMEA. Como BDR, serás responsable por establecer el primer contacto con los principales hoteles y resorts de España. Tu principal misión será conectar y generar interés en los clientes potenciales para nuestra plataforma IA de atención al viajero y generar oportunidades comerciales para los vendedores (Business Development Manager).     Sobre nosotros:     Asksuite es la empresa SaaS que ha desarrollado la primera plataforma hotelera omnicanal de atención al cliente y un asistente virtual de reservas con inteligencia artificial que presta servicio 24/7 y está en diversos idiomas. La empresa ha sido cuatro veces ganadora de un premio mundial en la industria de hotelería/turismo, cuenta con clientes en más de 40 países (y creciendo) y tiene un ambiente multicultural con empleados a lo largo del mundo. ¡Actualmente, nuestro equipo está conformado por más de 100 talentos y estamos buscando a una persona con ganas de aprender y seguir creciendo junto a nuestra comunidad!     ¿Cuáles son las principales actividades en este rol?     Prospectar activamente e interactuar con clientes potenciales en España a través de e-mail, teléfono, LinkedIn, etc; Hacer seguimiento y bater las metas en llamadas, e-mails y contactos; Identificar y cualificar nuevas oportunidades de venta (inbound y outbound); Ser el primer punto de contacto en el proceso de ventas, creando engagement y estrategias para que los clientes se interesen por nuestro producto y vean cómo marca la diferencia; Programar reuniones, demostraciones y presentar el lead al Business Development Manager que será responsable de la cuenta; Mantener actualizado el sistema de ventas, controlando el proceso y alcanzando las metas individuales; Analizar tus resultados junto con el director para una mejora continua; Apoyar al equipo para alcanzar los resultados y KPIs previamente acordados.     Te irá muy bien si:     Eres muy comunicativo y te gusta hablar con personas de distintas culturas; Tienes motivación propia y te gustan los retos; Eres capaz de trabajar de forma independiente, pero también como parte de un equipo en un entorno de ritmo rápido; Te entusiasma el aprendizaje continuo, porque te entrenaremos para mejorar tus conocimientos y habilidades de venta; Te centras en las métricas para lograr el objetivo. Al menos 6 meses de experiencia en ventas; Excelente capacidad de comunicación y redacción, especialmente profesional; Disponibilidad para trabajar 40 horas a la semana (Lunes a Viernes); Hablante nativo de español con inglés avanzado.     Sería genial si tienes (no requerido):     Experiencia como BDR o Inside Sales; Experiencia en una empresa de SaaS; Experiencia en el sector hotelero.     ¿Y cuáles son los beneficios de formar parte de Asksuite?     Somos un Great Place to Work (GPTW); Ofrecemos un ambiente de trabajo flexible y dinámico; No tenemos código de vestimenta; Poseemos una cultura de retroalimentación y desenvolvimiento; Contamos con un ambiente multicultural e inclusivo; Somos una startup global con más de 2000 clientes en más de 40 países; Nos estamos expandiendo rápidamente, por lo que ofrecemos oportunidades para crecer internamente.     ¿Te has identificado? ¡Regístrate y ven a acompañarnos en este viaje!
Industry: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI

Title: Managing Director
Description: Company Description     Founded in 2000, with start-up investment capital from Sony, M3’s mission is to make use of the internet to increase, as much as possible, the number of people who can live longer and healthier lives, and to reduce, as much as possible, the amount of unnecessary medical costs. Key achievements of M3 Inc. include:     Named in Fortune’s 2020 ‘Future 50’ list, ahead of Facebook and Amazon Ranked in Forbes’ 2020 Global 2000 list of the world’s largest public companies M3 is the only company incorporated after the year 2000 to be included in the Nikkei 225 Index Listed in Forbes’ ‘Asia’s 200 Best Over a Billion’ in 2019 In 2020 M3 founded the ‘M3: Stop COVID-19 Fund’ and pledged one billion yen to support COVID-19 related initiatives     M3’s legacy lies in the power of trusted physician platforms. Around the world, M3 organizations leverage these highly engaged digital communities to deliver medical education, job placement, and market research, to improve global patient outcomes.     Due to our continued growth, we are hiring for a Managing Director to join iDoctus, an M3 company.     Job Description     About the Business Division:     iDoctus is part of the M3 group, we are a young company with a start-up mindset and a powerful team of highly motivated, highly skilled professionals. All of us are dedicated to make our medical apps a revolution in the digital health space, in Spain, LatAm and beyond. We have developed the leading medical app in the region, with the best app rating in the app stores, and more than 500,000 healthcare professional users across 19 countries. Our app saves real lives, and that is our main motivation. We do everything it takes to improve the everyday medical practices of our doctors.     Duties/Responsibilities     Develop and refine the value proposition of iDoctus services as a valid alternative to traditional communication channels, and position iDoctus as the strategic partner for pharma brand teams on digital communications. iDoctus has already established itself as a trusted information source among physicians. The incoming Managing Director will strengthen its position and value toward pharmaceutical sponsors. Take the leadership to convince and persuade the pharmaceutical brand customers to enhance their physician communications with advanced digital channels. Collaborate with M3 Group companies to expand and deepen iDoctus solutions within Spain and LatAm, Collaborate with M3 Group companies and seek opportunities to expand iDoctus service to outside of its current regions. Lead all functions of the company, including sales, client service, product development, membership management, and marketing. Continue to enhance iDoctus mobile app’s value for physician users. Explore additional revenue streams using iDoctus assets, potentially with external partners Support to other M3 Group companies with initiatives relating to iDoctus: e.g. product development for CDS apps, global commercial opportunities, etc. Works with the board of directors and other executives to establish short-term objectives and long-range goals, and related plans and policies. Responsible for overall P&L. develop budget, review financials monthly and ensure the company will deliver above the set budgeted targets. Ensures the company's compliance with all applicable laws, rules, regulations, and standards. Develop network in the industry and identify business opportunities for further growth, including commercial partnerships and potential acquisitions.     Qualifications     Bilingual and able to fluently speak Spanish and English Strong sales leadership and experience in consultative sales and revenue generation. Experience with Pharmaceutical brand management acting as a brand manager or providing marketing solutions to brand items. Ability to understand pharmaceutical market, develop brand strategies, and advise on digital marketing approaches. Experience managing commercial teams including sales, client service, and client marketing. Experience preferred with P&L responsibility including accounting, HR, IT, product/engineering. Experience in developing profitable strategies and implementing vision. In-depth knowledge of corporate governance and general management best practices

Title: Agente de reservas con inglés 100% REMOTO. (JULIO a OCTUBRE)
Description: Empresa líder sector Inmobiliario|Agente de Reservas con Inglés.     About Our Client     Empresa del sector inmobiliario online internacional que ofrece alojamientos de alquiler verificados en 100 ciudades europeas.     Respaldados por algunos de los inversores internacionales más reputados de Silicon Valley, el Reino Unido y España.     Job Description     ¿Cuáles serían tus funciones como Agente de Reservas?     Responder, investigar y guiar a los clientes a través del proceso de reserva online. Proporcionar a los clientes información detallada sobre nuestros servicios para responder a posibles preguntas y crear futuras reservas. Comunicar los comentarios y sugerencias de los clientes a otros departamentos para realizar mejoras continuas. Garantizar que los clientes que utilicen nuestro sitio web dispongan de toda la información y el apoyo necesarios para realizar una solicitud de reserva y que esta se cierre sin problemas.     The Successful Applicant     Perfil Buscado     Nivel alto de inglés. Alemán, francés portugués o italiano sería una gran ventaja Tener tanto una mentalidad de ventas como de servicio al cliente Ser flexible para trabajar algunos fines de semana (alrededor de una vez cada 6 semanas).     Un alto nivel de habilidades de comunicación verbal y escrita.     Gestionar eficaz y eficientemente el tiempo con el fin de cerrar las reservas más rápido. Orientado a objetivos y con ganas de estar siempre aprendiendo.     What's On Offer     La empresa ofrece las siguientes condiciones:     Contrato temporal de 3 meses con posibilidad de ampliación. Total flexibilidad remota y horario de trabajo flexible. Lunes a jueves: 9:00h a 18:00/19:0h. Viernes con flexibilidad de salida. Salario: 20.00k más variable trimestral. Un trabajo desafiante y creativo en una empresa innovadora, en constante crecimiento, de rápida evolución y gestionada por sus propietarios con muchas oportunidades de crecimiento Una cultura corporativa abierta con mucho espacio para nuevas ideas e impulsos Entorno de trabajo internacional con más de 20 nacionalidades. Presupuesto para formación, eventos de empresa y actividades de team building.     Contact: Susana Chichón     Quote job ref: JN-062023-6075238

Title: Junior Sales Development Representative (SDR)
Description: About Hubtype     Hubtype is building tools that help companies communicate with their customers on messaging apps like WhatsApp or Telegram. Some of the largest companies in Europe (like EPSON, Levi's, Volkswagen or Allianz) use our products to attend to millions of customers every month. Our mission is to create better business-consumer relationships by embracing simple, meaningful, and customer-centric communication.     We are growing fast and we're in a unique position to become the leaders in the EU conversational apps space thanks to our award-winning, open-source chatbot technology, and exclusive partnerships.     About The Role     The ideal candidate is an energetic self-starter with the ability to identify influencers and key decision-makers within accounts. You will discover qualified opportunities by creating tailored messages for outbound prospects in order to build rapport and establish long-term relationships.     Responsibilities     Be the face of Hubtype for new prospects on International markets. Set up first meetings with new contacts for the sales team Identify the right ICPs and the value propositions that will resonate most with each prospect lead Assist in making sure the meeting gets done and converts into an opportunity Consistently hit targets and learn constantly, in order to prepare for a successful career in sales     Requirements     This is an entry-level sales position, but we require being a proficient english speaker Some experience in a similar role (can be an internship), preferably at a software or technology provider, ideally selling SaaS products Ability to articulate value propositions and communicate them via phone, email or LinkedIn Excellent written communication will be a game-changer in this role Ability to communicate with customers in a positive and approachable way Confidence in dealing with prospects, including those in junior and senior management positions at enterprise size companies Experience with keeping track of your activities in a sales CRM and an understanding of the importance of attention to detail and data quality     Benefits     What we offer Hubtype seeks top global talent and we offer competitive fixed salary variant on experience and attractive On-Target Earnings plan Full time remote work. Working with amazing people from all over the world, with different cultures, experiences, and knowledge Vacation: 27 days per year + bank holidays + your birthday + volunteer day Workstation budget for making great work happen at home Attractive Benefits & Perks Plan, centered in Learning & Development + Wellbeing As an SDR at Hubtype, you will be joining a very fast-paced pathway for ambitious and motivated individuals interested in a sales career. This accelerated sales track is made up of two distinct phases: Entry: You will work as an SDR with a dedicated Mentor that will share with you all their knowledge. We will teach you about the SaaS technology industry. You will generate sales demand and pipeline revenue through the development of inbound and outbound leads. This job will help you develop foundational sales skills and an authentic sales approach. Advanced: You will be promoted in alignment with the sales team and sales manager. At this stage, you will continue to develop leads, and will have the opportunity to conduct first meetings & run demos. You will also learn from top performing account partners how to be successful and understand the full cycle of the deal, from lead to close

Title: Product Designer (100% remoto)
Description: Proyecto estable, 100% teletrabajo|Formarás parte de un ecosistema de Talento Tecnológico    About Our Client  Page Consulting Tech Solutions, es el área de PageGroup especializada en la realización de proyectos IT en clientes, ofreciendo una amplia variedad de soluciones tecnológicas a medida con la flexibilidad y agilidad requerida (https://www.michaelpage.es/seleccion-personal/technology-consulting)  Job Description   Crear diseños atractivos y efectivos para productos digitales que sean intuitivos y fáciles de usar para los clientes en todos los canales (web, móvil, aplicaciones). Excelentes habilidades de diseño y conocimiento avanzado de herramientas de diseño como Figma. Title: RECRUITMENT CONSULTANT (360º)
Description: ¿Buscas formar parte de una empresa en pleno crecimiento? ¿Te gustaría convertirte en una pieza clave en una organización? ¿Quieres crecer profesionalmente sin dejar de lado tu crecimiento personal? Si buscas un proyecto diferente, ¡queremos conocerte!  onhunters somos una firma de búsqueda y seleccion especializada a nivel nacional e internacional y estamos buscando un/a BUSINESS DEVELOPER - HEADHUNTER para nuestro equipo.  ¿Cuáles serán tus funciones?  Analizar, estudiar el mercado y generar propuestas de valor de acuerdo a los servicios prestados por la compañía (consultoría de RRHH, Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) y formación). Generar oportunidades comerciales a nivel nacional e internacional, estableciendo y ampliando relaciones con clientes a largo plazo. Gestionar el ciclo completo de los procesos de selección bajo tu responsabilidad. Planificar y diseñar los procesos de búsqueda y seleccion de las vacantes. Realizar entrevistas, evaluaciones de candidatos y elaboración de informes.  Requisitos  El candidato seleccionado aportará experiencia previa en seleccion de personal, desarrollo de negocio/comercial de servicios preferiblemente relacionados con él área de Recursos Humanos y nivel alto de inglés.  Si eres una persona ambiciosa, con actitud positiva, visión a largo plazo y buscas crecer profesionalmente, conciliar tu vida profesional/personal (política 100% teletrabajo) pero sobre todo, colaborar, formar parte y ser IMPORTANTE dentro una organización en pleno crecimiento, haznos llegar tu candidatura,

Title: Business Analyst con PowerBI y Analytics
Description: En BESIDE apostamos por el mejor talento dentro del sector tecnológico. Contamos con una unidad de Selección Especializada en perfiles de Ingeniería para incorporarse en la plantilla de nuestros clientes. Trabajamos con un amplio rango de empresas, que nos permitirá encontrarte el puesto que más se ajuste a tus necesidades e intereses profesionales. Te podrás incorporar en las empresas más innovadoras, ofreciéndote proyectos punteros dentro de las ramas de I+D, automoción, pharma, diseño de maquinaria, desarrollo de producto, etc.  Seleccionamos un/a Business Analyst con PowerBI y Analytics para incorporarse en el equipo de uno de nuestros principales clientes, compañía suiza que opera a nivel internacional y se dedica a la prestación de servicios de IT.  ¿Qué haré? Estas serán tus funciones principales:  Integrado en el equipo de Finanzas, se encargará:  Formará parte del equipo y trabajará en estrecha colaboración con el Project Manager de Suiza y el business analyst offshore. Trabajará directamente con el Project Manager de un cliente ubicado en Barcelona, perteneciente a la industria alimentaria. Responsable del business analyst, recopilación de requerimientos, implementación, pruebas, coordinación con el área de Business. Responsable de las actividades de sustentación de los productos desarrollados. Recopilación de requisitos, discusiones técnicas, coordinación y actividades relacionadas con los proyectos. El área principal de desarrollo será PowerBI y herramientas de visualización de datos. También realizará algunas actividades de gestión de proyectos.   Beneficios que tendrás en tu lugar de trabajo:  Contratación directa por parte de la Compañía, 6 meses+indefinido. Plan de carrera y desarrollo profesional dentro del Grupo. Posibilidad de desarrollar el trabajo 100% remoto. Salario a convenir según expertise y conocimientos aportados por el/la candidato/a.   Requisitos:  Imprescindible:  Formación técnica mín. CFGS. Al menos 6 años de experiencia como Business Analyst. Experiencia con PowerBI y Analytics. Nivel de inglés avanzado.   Muy valorable:  Conocimientos de Power Automate.

Title: Agente Telefónico 30h (TELETRABJO)
Description: ¡En Konecta, el talento marca la diferencia y sabemos que los grandes profesionales, hacen grandes compañías!  Gracias a nuestro equipo, cada vez son más las empresas que confían en nosotros para que podamos brindarles la mejor experiencia en cada interacción y en cada punto de contacto con sus clientes.  Estamos buscando personal para nuestro servicio de emisión de llamadas para empresa de carácter social, en modelo de teletrabajo (debes ir a sede a recoger el equipo en el Polígono de Onzonilla).  En cuanto el proceso de selección finalice, te brindaremos una completa formación tras la cual, día a día, irás creciendo personal y profesionalmente, siendo parte importante de mantenernos como empresa líder del sector del contact center.  Requisitos del puesto:  Habilidad de comunicación. Interés por participar en una de las empresas líderes en el sector.   Desde Konecta te garantizamos:  Posibilidades reales de crecimiento. Formación previa del 05/07 al 14/07 en horario de 9-15h Incorporación: 17/07 Jornada: 30 h/sem de lunes a viernes. Horario: turnos rotativos de 09 a 15 y de 15 a 21 Salario: 969 € brutos /mes + increibles incentivos mensuales.   ¡Anímate a Konectar!  Requisitos:  Habilidad de comunicación. Interés por participar en una de las empresas líderes en el sector.

Title: Property Manager
Description: EL candidato, cuya ubicación será la oficina principal de MVGM en Madrid, sería el responsable de la gestión de los inmuebles que le sean asignados. Controla la gestión operativa, y apoya la financiera del inmueble, supervisando todos los servicios, operaciones y funciones acordadas en el mandato de gestión firmado con el cliente:  Desarrollar e implementar el plan de gestión anual de cada inmueble Supervisar el desarrollo y gestión del presupuesto operativo anual de cada inmueble Revisar, controlar y facilitar al cliente informes mensuales, trimestrales y anuales financieros y operativos Desarrollar e implementar programas innovadores, procedimientos o procesos que reduzcan tanto a corto como a largo plazo, los costes operativos del inmueble Maximizar la relación con los proveedores y contratistas de preferencia y expandir la relación con nuevos prestadores de servicios para los activos Coordinar con los diferentes proveedores y contratistas, la consecución de los objetivos establecidos Optimizar la relación gestor – arrendatario – cliente Asegurar el cumplimiento de lo estipulado en los contratos de arrendamiento Priorizar y atender todas las demandas de cada inmueble y sus usuarios, tomando las medidas y/o acciones apropiadas en cada caso Realizar visitas periódicas al inmueble, además de las necesarias en caso de problemas Gestionar y fomentar la relación con el cliente Asegurar el cumplimiento de los estándares de auditoria del cliente   Conocimientos requeridos:  Titulación Universitaria, (Diplomado o licenciado), preferentemente en Empresariales, ICADE, o ramas de Arquitectura y/o Ingeniería Nivel alto de Ingles Conocimiento general del sector inmobiliario Conocimientos técnicos generales de construcción y del funcionamiento y mantenimiento de los inmuebles Paquete office nivel avanzado, especialmente Excel   Conocimientos deseables:  Legislación relativa a los contratos de arrendamiento de inmuebles Gestión presupuestaria

Title: Candidatura espontánea Woodea
Description: ¿Quieres unirte a Woodea pero no hay vacantes abiertas que te encajen? Keep Calm! Seguro que pronto surgirá la oportunidad ;) Si quieres estar al tanto, ¡estás en el lugar indicado!     Desde aquí, podrás compartir con nosotros tu perfil y tu motivación por unirte a nuestro equipo, pero, antes de nada, queremos presentarnos. A continuación, te detallamos todo lo que necesitas saber para animarte :)     Nuestro propósito     Woodea es una constructora nativa digital, industrializada, sostenible y lean, que tiene como objetivo ejecutar construcciones con una muy baja huella de Carbono. Para aportar valor en un mercado tan competitivo, aplicamos estrategias de diferentes ámbitos, especialmente de la industria automotriz y manufacturera para hacer más eficientes los procesos.     Nos basamos en tres pilares: LEAN, BIM e Industrialización por componentes, todas estas herramientas puestas al servicio de la sostenibilidad, utilizando madera técnica y materiales basados en la naturaleza para hacer edificios más amigables con nuestro entorno.     Somos una empresa formada por profesionales expertos y reconocidos en el ecosistema emprendedor y en el sector de la construcción industrializada y respaldada por Zubi Group, holding empresarial referente en inversión y emprendimiento de triple impacto: social, medioambiental y económico.     Creemos que en la diversidad está la innovación y cada Woodie aporta un valor diferencial pero, si o si necesitarás: AUDACIA para acometer este desafío, TRANSPARENCIA a la hora de detallar en qué aspectos puedes aportar y en cuáles no (no se puede ser especialista en todo!) y AMOR por el planeta, por las personas y por la propia actividad que vamos a desarrollar (manos a la obra! No hay planeta B ni tiempo que perder). ¿Te identificas con nuestros valores? Es lo único indispensable, lo demás se puede aprender 🙂     Anímate a enviarnos tu CV si     No te encaja ninguna de las vacantes abiertas pero quieres formar parte de esta gran familia de personas soñadoras y sabes que con tu aporte seremos mejores Compartes nuestros valores y quieres sumar fuerzas para ayudar a resolver retos sociales y ambientales Navegas bien y te adaptas rápido en un entorno de cambio constante, complejo, diverso y dinámico Eres una persona inconformista e innovadora. Buscas que los cambios sucedan     ¿Quieres saber por qué merece la pena trabajar en Woodea?     Somos una constructora innovadora y referente en la industrialización por componentes, con base en madera técnica y foco en la sostenibilidad. Con tu trabajo, podrás hacer del mundo un lugar mejor, ¿qué más puedes pedir? Somos parte de un grupo de personas unidas por una misma pasión y por la misión de resolver retos ambientales, sociales y económicos y, así, hacer un futuro mejor (con grandes expertos en ESG e Impacto, -lo que se dice es verdad y se mide-) Te acompañará un equipo igual de comprometido de grandes personas y con un gran talento, con el que no te aburrirás y el aprendizaje será constante. Somos una organización con una cultura centrada en las personas (employee centric culture) y por eso mismo tendrás total libertad para organizar tu tiempo y espacio de trabajo. Tenemos un modelo de trabajo híbrido real: podrás trabajar (y lo harás y mucho!) desde casa o desde nuestras dos oficinas (Valencia y Madrid) a tu demanda, para que puedas conciliar según tus necesidades Somos “doers” y cuando decimos que ponemos el foco en las personas es porque de verdad pensamos en el bienestar, desarrollo y aprendizaje continuo, de nuestros equipos. Cuando nos conozcamos te contaremos con más detalle todas las iniciativas que tenemos al respecto :)     Si no te encajan ninguna de nuestras vacantes abiertas pero siempre has querido trabajar en una organización con impacto positivo y donde, además, nos preocupamos genuinamente por las personas, este es tu lugar. Podrás dedicar tu talento y energía a crear soluciones innovadoras en la construcción que nos ayuden en el urgente camino de la sostenibilidad y nosotros cuidaremos de que tengas todo lo importante para lograrlo :)     ¡Indícanos qué te motiva y qué te gustaría aportar a nuestro equipo! ¡Estamos deseando conocerte!     En Woodea, garantizamos el cumplimiento de la legislación vigente en materia de igualdad, objetividad y no discriminación, basando todos nuestros procesos de selección en la cualificación y las competencias de las candidaturas.

Title: Jefe/a de Proyecto
Description: SG TECH, perteneciente al grupo HPS, precisa incorporar un perfil de Jefe/a de Proyecto, para el desarrollo de Software de importante cliente especializado en servicios y soluciones IoT.     Ofrecemos     Contrato indefinido. Participación en proyectos y tecnologías innovadores. Empresa en constante evolución. Buen ambiente de trabajo. Modelo de trabajo 100% remoto. Horario: L-J: 9- 19:00 / V 9:00 – 15:00 (Jornada intensiva verano).     Funciones     Desarrollo y dirección de proyectos web en backend y frontend. Gestión de desarrolladores, planificación y asignación de tareas. Comunicación con clientes y acuerdo de requisitos e hitos a cumplir.     Requisitos     3 años de experiencia desarrollando proyectos web tanto en frontend como en backend. Experiencia estando al cargo de proyectos, planificando tareas, dirigiendo personal y tratando con clientes. Experiencia con flujos de trabajo colaborativo con Git Flow o similares basados en gestión de ramas. Experiencia previa como desarrollador/a. Nivel de inglés medio.     Conocimientos     Buenas prácticas en desarrollo web. Reglas de código limpio y principios SOLID. Diseño de software por capas y arquitectura hexagonal. Desarrollo de APIs RESTful estandarizadas. Tests unitarios, e2e y de integración en Node en frontend y backend Nociones generales de diseño web y UX.     Tecnologías Obligatorias     Backend: Node con Express y Sequelize. Frontend: Angular con Angular Material y SCSS. Bases de datos: PostgreSQL. Control de versiones: Git y GitLab o GitHub. Testing: Karma, Jasmine, Cypress, Jest o similares DevOps: Despliegue en servidores Linux con Docker.     Tecnologías Deseables     Detallar en la solicitud ejemplos de proyectos ejecutados y qué problemas resolvieron. Aportar repositorio con proyectos personales de ejemplo. Conocimientos de Grafana. Conocimientos de backend con Nest.js. Conocimientos de backend con Python (p ej, Flask y Django). Conocimientos de MongoDB.
Function: Gestión y Tecnología de la información

Title: Senior Product Manager
Description: Producter is an all-in-one customer-centric product management software for startups that want to grow faster with product-led growth.     The Role     As a Product Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the development and execution of our product strategy. You will work closely with our engineering, design, and marketing teams to drive product development, from ideation to launch. This is a critical role that requires strong communication and product management skills, as well as a deep understanding of our customers and market trends.     Your Responsibilities Will Include     Prioritize, develop, and execute on product roadmap based on our product strategy to reduce friction for all users in the product development journey. Strong familiarity with core software development concepts and interfacing closely with engineering. Talk to users and turn learnings into features to continuously improve the user experience. Drive new features and products from ideation through launch and work cross-functionally to ensure GTM success.     Ideal Profile     3+ years of experience as a Product Manager in a tech startup or a fast-paced environment. Strong understanding of new product management approaches and experience working with cross-functional teams. Ability to prioritize tasks, manage timelines, and deliver high-quality products on time. Excellent communication skills and ability to build relationships with stakeholders at all levels. Experience with product analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Mixpanel, or Amplitude.     What's on Offer?     Competitive salary and equity package Health, dental, and vision insurance. 401(k) retirement plan with employer match Unlimited paid time off. Opportunity to work with a talented and passionate team Dynamic and collaborative work environment. Chance to make a significant impact on a fast-growing startup.

Title: International Sales Manager
Description: About Us     Cyberdrone is an international creator of high-tech drone shows, based in Dubai. We transform UAVs into powerful high-speed long-lasting light machines and invent stunning visual experiences of a complex animation. Our diverse team consists of 20+ professionals – engineers, artists, animators, event and business managers. We improve drone technology and discover innovative solutions to lead the industry. Cyberdrone aspires to amaze and evoke the brightest emotions in customers. And we believe that the show must not only go on but also excel. Check cyberdrone.com, you will be impressed.     To make our work even more efficient and successful we need a vigorous International Sales Manager.     Responsibilities:     Grow sales via network expansion and direct sales. Create and execute short-/ long-term strategies and plans for international sales. Research new markets and potential customers. Develop and maintain good professional relationships with main accounts and strategic partners of Cyberdrone. Attract potential clients using diverse resources and your own contact base, make cold calls with selling scripts. Process incoming requests, organize pre-sales, close deals. Create & maintain databases and keep records. Coordinate with the marketing team. Prepare and present monthly, quarterly and annual reports. Monitor competitor activity and industry trends. Engage with the management of Cyberdrone to create new services, products, markets.     Requirements:     5+ years of a proven, successful track record in International Sales, creating long lasting, prosperous client relations; High, proven success rate of deal closings; Fluent English, C1+ level, both speaking and writing; other languages are a benefit; Excellent communication skills; Outstanding Customer focus; Results orientation, proactivity and extra high responsibility.     Conditions:     Official Employment (no freelance). UAE visa (if needed). Relocation support. Competitive salary. Full time work (40 hours per week). Paid sick leaves and vacations (24 working days).     Powered by JazzHR     w8KGShm4w9

Title: Consultor Fiori Jr
Description: En Clever Functional Team Team brindamos servicio integral de consultoría SAP a nuestros clientes.
