Title: Purchasing Director
Description: Who we are:     Wikifarmer is a global platform with the mission of empowering farmers by educating them and offering them access to the open market to sell their products at fair prices.     The Problem We Are Solving:     Most farmers in the world still cultivate their fields with techniques learned from experience or taught by their ancestors, leading to non-optimum practices in terms of yield and regard to the environmental impact.     Farmers produce the most valuable part of the food supply chain, but they are the ones getting the least value out of it.     How we are fixing this:     Wikifarmer is building both an educational platform and a digital Marketplace. On one side of our Platform, producers can tap into and update their agricultural knowledge and practices and on the other side they can upload their products for free, gaining immediate and direct access to domestic and international markets.     What we are looking for:     Having recently secured a new round of funding from Point Nine (Revolut, Delivery Hero, Typeform) we are starting to build our core leadership team - central to those hires will be a Purchasing Director for our Marketplace, working closely with the Founders of Wikifarmer.     Job Duties and Responsibilities:     The Purchasing Director will be responsible for developing and executing purchasing strategies, negotiating deals, and managing vendor relationships within the food industry across the Mediterranean region (producers, agricultural cooperatives and packing houses), specifically in fresh fruit and vegetables and olive oils. You will also build, develop, lead, and inspire an international team as the business grows.     Develop, lead and execute purchasing strategies, both domestic and international Increase the depth of suppliers on specific products across all countries (Mediterranean) Negotiation, closing deals with optimal terms Create strong relationships with existing and new suppliers Identify and partner with new suppliers in completely new categories Manage potential claims coming from customers Assess, manage, and mitigate risk Manage and ensure quality together with the quality department Work closely with sales teams to match demand with supply Provide insights on potential price fluctuations per product     Requirements:     Solid experience (10+ years) purchasing fruit and vegetables from producers across the Mediterranean region. Olive oil experience is a huge bonus Leadership experience, ideally having built a high-performing team from ground up Excellent negotiation and networking skills Proven experience building strong working relationships with both existing and new producers Tech savvy, we are digitalising this industry and we need to be ahead of the curve The ideal candidate with also have quality control experience Business fluency in English as well as Spanish, Italian or both You must be located in either Spain or Italy     What we offer:     24 days annual leave plus bank holidays Fixed salary (€80k - €120k) depending on location and experience) plus a bonus scheme for successful deals Car Allowance Equity Private Medical Insurance L&D budget We are an early startup which is going places and you can make an immediate impact Transparency and Collaboration please submit your CV in English

Title: Full Remote: Senior Ui/Ux Designer
Description: Somos una startup de rápido crecimiento en un entorno muy dinámico, rápido y exigente con sede en Barcelona.     Llevamos 2 años en el mercado y estamos presentes en 4 países, el objetivo para finales de 2023 es estar en 25. Queremos revolucionar el sector del fitness y de la nutrición.     En estos momentos tenemos más de 30.000 usuarios de pago usando nuestra app y estamos buscando una diseñadora o incluso un diseñador de producto con una amplia sensibilidad estética, un mix de UX/UI con experiencia y muchas ganas de sumar en un proyecto que está en permanente evolución.     ¿Qué harás?     Los primeros 6 meses     Todo lo relacionado con UI/UX en nuestra aplicación móvil.     Es una posición 100% hands on, trabajarás desde las trincheras 100% enfocado en producto, junto al equipo de negocio y desarrollo en mejorar la versión actual de la aplicación. Desde el onboarding hasta nuevas features.     Trabajamos en un entorno startUp con metodologías de integración continua.     Paralelamente al producto apoyarás al equipo de diseño ( redes sociales presentaciones, … ) dando visión de marca.     A partir del 6o mes     Definir y construir el equipo de diseño para liderarlo     En este punto haremos una revisión salarial.     A partir del año     Intervenir en las reuniones de producto y de negocio para aportar tu punto de vista para las futuras funcionalidades de la app     Requisitos     5 años de experiencia profesional en diseño     Al menos 3 años de experiencia diseñando aplicaciones móviles, independientemente de B2B o B2C     Que te interese el deporte y la salud en general, si no tienes interés por el producto no creemos que vayas a disfrutar en el medio plazo liderando el equipo.     Si tienes alguna otra habilidad o conocimientos que no estén aquí pero consideras que puede ser interesante para nosotros, coméntanoslo. Puede que no hayamos caído en ello y, sin embargo, nos pueda aportar mucho valor.     ¿Por qué trabajar con BeJao?     60 a 80K revisables a los 6 meses. Salario competitivo basado en experiencia y revisiones salariales semestrales los primeros 2 años.     Ambiente de trabajo casual y dinámico donde el trabajo en equipo es clave.     Cuando te apteezca venir por la oficina disfrutarás de un maravilloso teatrro del sXIX en el corazón de Barcelona     Gym gratuito     Y sobre todo: siempre tendremos en cuenta aquello que es importante para ti.     ¿Eres tú?     Si tu perfil encaja con el de esta posición, te interesan los retos que se plantean y tienes ganas de trabajar con nosotros, queremos conocerte.     Para conocer mejor BeJAO, clica aquí: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0aL2R8f4yxo

Title: Compliance Risk Assessment and Internal Testing Analyst (Remote ES)
Description: Founded in 2012, Bitfinex is a digital asset trading platform offering state-of-the-art services for digital currency traders and global liquidity providers. We're on a mission to create the most innovative cryptocurrencies exchange. This is a unique opportunity, a rare window of time at the tipping point of the financial evolution. Much like the early days of the internet, blockchain technology faces complex new challenges and having the best team plays a pivotal role in success.     Our team is fully remote and globally distributed to capture the best talent from around the world. So far our company has grown fast and stayed lean to secure its place as a leader in the space.     If you get excited about being in an industry that is breaking new ground and have confidence you can conquer the most challenging feats we'll encounter, we want to talk to you. Join us, and help lay the foundation for a decentralized future.     Currently looking for:     Compliance Risk Assessment and Internal Testing Analyst (m/f)     The Compliance Risk Assessment and Internal Testing Analyst will cooperate closely with, and report to the Risk Assessment and Internal Testing Manger in the implementation of the company’s Anti Money laundering (AML) risk assessment framework. The incumbent will provide an objective assessment on internal controls, identify key findings, and propose recommendations to address risks and reinforce internal controls. Areas of focus will include products, delivery channels, geography and customer risk.     To succeed in this role, the incumbent will continuously strive to self-develop and enhance their skill sets including understanding the Company’s products and Services, blockchain technology, virtual currencies, suspicious activities in the space, and best investigative practices to mitigate against the risk of money laundering, financing terrorism or violating sanctions and to ensure the company’s robust Regulatory Compliance.     A strong understanding of the Company’s platform and products and services is required.     Responsibilities:     Evaluating inherent and residual risk. Identifying, characterizing, and documenting risks and controls. Performing control design assessment and effectiveness analysis: defining test samples, executing control effectiveness tests, and documenting results. Performing analysis and understanding of processes / activities through meetings and walkthroughs with process owners and involved stakeholders. Conducting preparatory work for assignments, including obtain information to better understand the scope and processes subject to analysis. Performing critical analysis on risk exposure current situation, proposing recommendations to reinforce controls. Bachelor's degree (preferred). Previous professional experience in risk management / internal control / compliance. Basic knowledge of blockchain technology (preferred). CAMS/CBP designation or equivalent (preferred). Ability to build relationships both internally and externally. Strong organization and time management skills. Team player as well as independent thinker with strong critical thinking and analytical skills.

Title: Controller financial junior
Description: Premiumguest, es definida como una compañía enfocada a la prestación de servicios de programación     y desarrollo de programas informáticos. El desarrollo de plataformas informáticas para la promoción,     reserva y venta online de todo tipo de entradas para espectáculos.     Todo comenzó en 2018. Nuestros fundadores, Anxo Coterillo, Pol Domingo, Iñaki Morton y Vicent Guasch crearon Premiumguest con la visión de digitalizar el sector del ocio.     En Premiumguest, creemos que existe una forma más eficiente de gestionar los eventos bajo tu propia     marca y promocionarte en nuevos canales de venta. Te ayudamos a vender entradas, gestionar listas de invitados, agilizar el acceso al evento y controlar todo en tiempo real. Además, gracias a nuestros     acuerdos con canales de promoción, podrás incrementar tus ingresos.     Misión de la empresa     Nuestra misión es consolidar el software en España y continuar con nuestra expansión en Estados     Unidos. A día de hoy, contamos con más de 250 clientes ubicados en Barcelona, Madrid, Málaga, Sevilla, Galicia... Incluso en Nueva York.     Con ello, empresas como Twenties Barcelona, Wolf Barcelona, Sutton Barcelona, Discoteca Latin Palace,     Tiffany's The Club, Grupo Larrumba, Grupo Moondance, etc. han confiado en nosotros para la gestión de sus eventos.     Contamos con grandes inversores como los fundadores de Glovo, El Tenedor, Exoticca, Holaluz... por     que confían en el éxito del proyecto y en su equipo. Y para ello, buscamos a los mejores para ayudarnos a escalar Premiumguest al siguiente nivel.     Nuestros valores principales     AMBICIÓN: Nuestro mayor deseo es alcanzar las metas propuestas por la empresa y en cada     departamento de ésta y así mejorar la gestión de los eventos de nuestros clientes.     WIN-WIN: Centramos todo nuestro empeño en que todas las partes puedan salir beneficiadas de     nuestras relaciones con clientes o empresas.     EXCELENCIA: Buscamos una calidad superior y el mejor de los resultados en el desarrollo de     cada tarea y en cada contacto u operación.     INTEGRIDAD: Generamos una confianza y una relación entre los valores que se marcan como     objetivo y las acciones que se realizan, actuando acorde a las ideas propias y de     Premiumguest.     OFERTA DE TRABAJO - CONTROLLER JUNIOR     La función principal de esta posición es diseñar herramientas y estrategias de control financiero en la     empresa y con ello la buena toma de decisiones.     Tareas a Realizar     Analizar y controlar proyectos Diseñar los instrumentos de control de gestión de la empresa Soporte en la elaboración del presupuesto anual y el plan estratégico de la empresa, así como     seguimiento de los planes de acción     Detectar desviaciones Elaboración de reporting periodico para la dirección Identificación de riesgos y oportunidades Seguimiento de los resultados mensuales y gestión de los KPI ́s Estar atento de las tendencias tecnológicas, sociales y económicas del entorno     Requisitos del candidato o candidata     Organizado, discreto, responsable y analítico. + 3 años de experiencia en controller o departamento financiero Software ERP financiero: Holded Estudios: ADE o empresariales + plus finanzas Buen manejo de Excel y Powerpoint ( presentaciones)     Condiciones de la oferta     Horario de 9h a 18h 100% teletrabajo Dia libre por tu cumpleaños Salario: 24k bruto anual Contrato indefinido
Industry: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI

Title: Front-end developer
Description: En Grupo MASMOVIL estamos comprometidos con la sociedad. Las personas son la clave de nuestro éxito y creemos firmemente en la riqueza que ofrece la diversidad cultural, funcional, de edad o de género. Por ello, valoramos a los profesionales por su valía y ganas de aportar, promoviendo la igualdad de oportunidades para todos. Te estamos esperando. Queremos crecer contigo y juntos generar impacto social positivo.  Buscamos una persona que se incorporé como Front-end developer, pertenecerás a una comunidad con reuniones recurrentes entre los demás desarrolladores frontend, colaborando y compartiendo librerías, buenas prácticas, construyendo y proponiendo ideas sobre el mantenimiento de nuestro repositorio de código. Todos nuestros desarrollos están en cloud utilizando kubernetes en un entorno portable y escalable donde aplicamos principios de integración y despliegue contínuo.  Principales responsabilidades:  Los desarrolladores frontend de esta unidad son responsables de transformar el diseño y la visión del producto en un producto funcional.  Su trabajo influye directamente en cómo los usuarios interactuarán con el sistema. Trabajarán intensamente para mantenerse al tanto de la tecnología, que cambia rápidamente, e invertirán energía en aprender nuevos conceptos, marcos, lenguajes y metodologías.  No solo estarán atrapados en las tendencias de la industria en los marcos de desarrollo de clientes, sino que también saben lo que traerá el futuro cercano. Además, tendrán una comprensión básica de la programación back-end y estarán dispuestos a aprender más para ayudar a los desarrolladores back-end a escribir APIs que les ayuden a entregar un gran producto.  Desarrollar aplicaciones avanzadas de e-commerce, e-care / m-care de acuerdo con el diseño. Dar feedback a los diseñadores y sugerir intercambios cuando sea necesario. Asegurarse de que el código siga las últimas prácticas de codificación y estándares de la industria. Trabajar estrechamente con los desarrolladores de back-end para comprender y utilizar correctamente las APIs. Escribir pruebas unitarias, componentes, integración y E2E desarrollando herramientas de automatización para las tareas diarias. Desafiar ideas y opiniones para evitar trampas y soluciones ineficientes.   Must:  Experiencia y conocimientos de 3+ años recientes con algún framework de JavaScript (ES6) Conocimientos en HTML5/CSS3/SASS y uso de APIs del navegador Experiencia en desarrollo de aplicaciones web multidispositivo Conocimiento y manejo de Git y Github Aplicación de metodologías ágiles: Scrum, Kanban Experiencia en integraciones con APIs REST   Should:  Experiencia reciente con React TypeScript CSS-in-JS: Styled Components Storybook React Query / Mobx / Redux Sagas / Observables Desarrollo de test de integración con Jest y react-testing-library Desarrollo de test de aceptación y e2e con Cypress   Nice to have:  NextJS Uso de monorepos Conocimiento de sistemas de construcción (nx, bazel...) Uso de contenedores con Docker Manejo de infraestructura k8s   Requisitos:  Perfil del candidato y mindset:  Excelentes habilidades de comunicación con la capacidad de comunicar conceptos técnicos complejos y alinear a los miembros del equipo en las decisiones. Foco en la resolución de problemas con la capacidad de procesar rápidamente información compleja y presentarla de forma clara y sencilla a personas no técnicas. Buen “team player” que colabora para crear soluciones innovadoras de manera eficiente. El dominio del inglés y el español es imprescindible. Apasionado por la tecnología y entusiasmado con el impacto de las tecnologías emergentes / disruptivas. Autonomía en iniciativa, con capacidad para trabajar en un entorno que fomente las mentes emprendedoras. Promotor de la cultura de total transparencia y confianza Abierto para aprender e innovar.
Function: Gestión y Tecnología de la información

Title: Looking for a Business Development Executive - Remote - European Union
Description: Hi     Greeting from Strakflow !     We are looking for a Business Development Executive - Remote - European Union.     We produce mind-blowing results by constantly staying at the forefront of modern technology and cutting-edge processes and practices. Our teams are renowned for their strong initiative, not just     in taking care of their day-to-day responsibilities but in helping identify ways to build and grow. We are looking for an established Business Development Executive to join our team and identify opportunities to develop our business. The ideal candidate has experience in the gaming industry, with a good track record in sales and an “End to End” background.To be considered for this position you need to submit your CV in English.     Responsibilities:     Contacting potential clients to establish rapport and arrange meetings Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives Researching organizations and individuals to find new opportunities Increasing the value of current customers while attracting new ones Finding and developing new markets and improving sales Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events Developing quotes and proposals for clients Developing goals for the development team and business growth and ensuring they are met Helping team members develop their skills     Requirements     3+ years of experience in sales for the gaming industry Bachelor’s degree in business, marketing, or related field Proficient level of English, oral and written communications skills essential Results oriented with a record of success in meeting deadlines A strong work ethic and a team player attitude with deep commitment to customer satisfaction Strong communication skills and IT fluency Ability to manage complex projects and multi-task Excellent organizational skills Ability to work autonomously and proactively Proficient in Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint     Benefits     Permanently remote position An opportunity to hone and improve your skills by applying them to a diverse variety of engaging projects Be part of an international group with offices worldwide Career growth and development Working closely with a multicultural team Ongoing training and professional self-improvement opportunities An inclusive culture and open communication     --     Powered by JazzHR     eGPsA5IGLR

Title: BackEnd Developers Java (100% Remoto)
Description: En BCNC GROUP buscamos incorporar Senior BackEnd Developers Java con experiencia contrastada en proyectos de microservicios para formar parte de nuestro equipo deslocalizado en una de las más importantes empresas multinacionales del sector retail.     Requisitos     Experiencia mínima de 5 años participando en el diseño de arquitectura de sistemas basado en servicios distribuidos. Experiencia demostrable en entornos de ejecución de alto rendimiento y concurrencia. Habituado/a a trabajar en desarrollo bajo el modelo de integración continua y revisión de código. Experiencia realizando labores de diseño y desarrollo de APIs con Java (8-17) Spring framework fundamentos DDD aplicando metodologías Agile Scrum/Kanban. Muy valorable aportar experiencia en desarrollo de tecnologías cloud y haber participado en la definición de una estrategia de APIs conociendo especificaciones estándar.     Funciones     Análisis implementación y refinamiento de tareas técnicas. Asegurar la calidad de los desarrollos. Revisión y validación de tareas de otros compañeros. Despliegues en distintos entornos. Diagnostico y resolución de posibles incidencias.     ¿Qué ofrecemos?     Contrato indefinido. Estabilidad laboral. Trabajar en importantes proyectos con las tecnologías más     punteras.     Posibilidad de realizar proyectos internacionales. Desarrollo de carrera real y formación. Teletrabajo 100 .     BCNC GROUP (https //bcncgroup.com/) es una empresa de ingeniería y tecnología con operaciones en España UK Alemania Francia y Suecia. Trabajamos con las multinacionales más prestigiosas de Europa ayudándoles a implementar sus proyectos estratégicos.     Java, Scrum, Spring Framework, Jira, confluence, Github, DDD, JUnit, MOCKITO, OpenApi, Jenkins, Sonar, Mongodb     0b431f968256338d9a47

Nuestra empresa es hoy referencia en el sector del Software Quality Assurance participando en varios proyectos de investigación a nivel europeo y con muchos más proyectos sobre los que podrás diseñar una trayectoria profesional a largo plazo. Title: REMOTE PRODUCT MANAGER/BUYER
Description: Accountable for the full life cycle of the products for which she/he is responsible; from the creation of the product, through the sampling process, chasing of shipment on time in the approved quality, the monitoring of sales and taking appropriate action to deliver the optimal commercial result until the product has sold out         Development of the complete, rationally structured, commercially sound, seasonal collection, using sales data to support;   Direct participation in defining of the collection structure for each month of the season, including development of the colour palette, sub category mix and style structure;   Responsible for knowing the customer and the value fashion marketplace. Continuous benchmarking of key competitors to ensure that we offer the best value in the market;   Meeting all deadlines of Critical Path;   Signing off of all orders split to supplier, meeting all commercial parameters;   Interactions with suppliers:    Purchase of the samples and sketches for order placement;   Placing the orders to suppliers, providing detailed information on the order with indication of the article, composition, colour and quantity of the product;   Provide full set of documents for assortment groups for each supplier in accordance with the placed order: 1. Bill of materials (list of used auxiliary materials, their position on the garment and the package). 2. Sizes specification for each style ;   Signing off all technical packs together with designer/print designer   Provide all information needed by suppliers, in line with the Critical Path, with necessary sketches of decorative details: prints, embroidery, etc.; coordinating and providing all information regarding product accessories needed, e.g. zips, buttons, draw cords etc   Full development of the styles the whole way through till mass production stage, and that styles are meeting technical requirements, comply with designers’ sketches and match the collection;   Control over production process, quality and correctness of the sizes of delivered product;   Information support of logistics processes;       Managing Garments Designers:    Setting the tasks for designers;   Provide complete information on requirements and possibilities;   Coordination of the creative work of the designers to ensure full compliance of the sketches with production capability and commercial requirements of the Company;   All the above to be in line with Critical Path;       Managing Print Designers (where necessary):    Setting the tasks for print designs in accordance with production plan;   Setting the tasks for design drawings;   All the above to be in line with Critical Path;       Manage tasks for Assistants   Sourcing of new suppliers, more profitable from commercial perspective, for existing and new products;   Interactions with all suppliers. Timely delivering to production units information about new rules, future seasonal collection, as well as timely setting of the tasks and subsequent control over their implementation;   Processing of analytical data. Regular monitoring of analytical data on commercial success of the particular styles, shapes, lines, colour combinations, etc. for subsequent improvements of collections’ structure;

Title: Partner Marketing Manager (Remote in Spain or UK)
Description: From smartphones to connected cars, location data is changing the way we live and the way business happens. CARTO is the platform that turns location data into more efficient delivery routes, better behavioral marketing, strategic store placements, and much more.     Everyone, from business analysts to developers and data scientists, use our software and location data to understand where and why things happen, optimize business processes, and predict future outcomes. Trusted by Mastercard, Bain, Coca-Cola, Ikea and many more enterprise organizations, CARTO is leading in the Location Intelligence (LI) space.     To continue our growth, we are looking for a high-energy, commercial and resourceful Partner Marketing Manager to work in collaboration with our global marketing, sales and partnerships teams to ensure we effectively scale our indirect business through partners (with a special focus on cloud partners). Our partner network includes a wide range of cloud, data and consulting companies, including Google Cloud, Snowflake, AWS, Databricks, SafeGraph, TomTom and many more. We’ve already delivered various successful co-marketing campaigns with our partners across multiple channels (e.g. events, reports, webinars, customer stories) and we’re looking for someone who will scale these activities further and optimize their performance.     Responsibilities:     Turn our partners into lead generators, working hand in hand with our go-to-market counterparts at a wide range of companies and the CARTO partnerships team to build the GTM strategy, make campaigns happen and create new opportunities. You don’t just wait for introductions, you go and find potential collaborators who can help us to drive demand Own campaign execution alongside our partners. You relish the challenge of throwing together a webinar storyline (and presenting it!), writing joint case studies with enterprise clients or storyboarding a video that highlights a specific use case of CARTO + {other technology}. You also build and grow these relationships so that partners love running such initiatives with CARTO because of all the opportunities that come from them. Be the main point of contact for all things marketing for our partners, constantly collaborating with other marketing team members to plan & execute campaigns and weigh in on the marketing side of things for our wider partnership plans Create sales enablement content that allows us to position our value proposition alongside our partners, whether that’s crafting combined value messaging, one pagers, decks, videos or battlecards that enable sellers internally and externally to excel, positioning solutions for use cases such as site selection, geomarketing, network optimization and much more Partner with sellers to use outbound strategies to target shared customers, using our marketing and sales stack to effectively book meetings and create opportunities. Educating our teams internally on the partner ecosystems we interact with, whether that is data products, cloud and data warehouses or business intelligence players.   You are:     Thirsty to learn about the space: constantly gaining intelligence on existing and new competitors, eager to consume podcasts and webinars or read relevant reports to keep your finger on the pulse of our industry and the ones we sell to. When you don’t know how to do something, you just find a way to learn about it Commercial acumen: you care about what moves the needle for opportunity creation, rather than focusing on vanity metrics Data-driven: you are passionate about using data from Salesforce, Google Analytics, Hubspot and other platforms to drive an effective demand generation strategy An exceptional communicator: both internally between departments and externally with clients and partners. You don’t just hang out with the marketers, you make the effort to spend a significant amount of time with sellers, pre-sales, data science and product to gain insights that are relevant to your work Customer-centric: obsessed by the needs of our clients and prospects, constantly learning about how their challenges are evolving A gifted curator of content: less is more, quality over quantity. You know how to write a punchy press release, a killer landing page or mindblowing case study A true challenger: you’re not scared to challenge the status quo and guide our marketing strategy, working closely with senior leadership. You have bias for action: you get a buzz out of crossing things off your to-do list, you have the “get it done” attitude A gifted copywriter and storyteller: you can translate highly complex technology concepts to compelling stories that our customers and prospects actually care about      You offer:     3 or more years experience working in the SaaS, data or technology space in a product marketing or demand generation role, regularly running partner marketing initiatives. An ability to translate the value of technology into business outcomes, engaging clients in enterprise Experience working in B2B SaaS in North America or Europe, ideally in Cloud, Data Science, GIS, Advanced Analytics, Business Intelligence or Big Data ecosystems A track record of creating high quality content and campaigns for a B2B technology product. Experience working with sales and marketing technology such as Salesforce, Hubspot, Outreach and Gong (or similar). Experience in external-facing meetings with partners and prospects Experience interacting with technical stakeholders at a SaaS company. Experience working with teams in multiple locations and cultures An eye for design and brand guardianship.      We offer:     Competitive, results-based compensation Access to our employee stock options plan Private medical insurance Flexible work hours in a focused but casual environment Education Stipend Health insurance Remote work allowance A big vision: to help the world use location-based data to make better decisions. We believe that openness and sustainability are baked into this vision, and we’re sharing it with the world Growth prospects at a truly welcoming, multicultural and multilingual company      To Apply     Do you feel that you don't check all of the requirements? At CARTO we believe that professional development happens through teaching and learning from your peers and managers. Even if you’re uncertain about whether you have the experience we’re looking for, please apply if this position sparks your curiosity.     A diversity of identity, perspective, and experience makes us stronger. We welcome you to apply to CARTO regardless of your background, gender, ethnicity, orientation, or ability.

Title: Payments Business Development (Full remote within Spain)
Description: Life is too short to work for a boring company, so why don’t you join us? We are looking for a passionate Payments Business Development. Your job will be very focused on analyzing data we collect to produce actionable recommendations that will optimize our revenue while keeping fraud levels under control. You will also help in obtaining merchant accounts for our different verticals in a smooth way, you will actively communicate with external partners and providers and will work closely with the finance department helping in their day-to-day activities.     The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, an interest for business development matters and an outstanding ability to work on different tasks without losing focus. You should carefully think about how to run your analysis and be eager to uncover hidden patterns..     Does that sound like you?     But first, let’s break the ice!     Who We Are & What We Do     At Leadtech, we work hard... and play harder! Our mission is to bring forward new business ideas and empower employees to achieve their goals in the online business world.     Since 2009, we have been fostering innovative and creative techniques across many industries, making us pioneers in online project management.     Leadtech is dedicated to constant improvement and inspiring new ideas daily for the world we live in and the future to come.     If you have a creative and innovative mind, Leadtech is looking for you!     Does this still look like your cup of tea? There’s more.     Responsibilities     You’re our perfect candidate if you:     Identify the most promising merchants and prospects that will help us grow a pipeline across various verticals Sell our cross-borders payment and fraud solutions and services to eCommerce merchants and possible PSP partners through cold calling, networking, fairs etc Help new merchants evaluate and handle detailed questions about our product capabilities Prepare thorough presentations and proposals for prospective merchants Orchestrate the entire Sales process and act as the main point of contact for merchants and internal stakeholders Maintain a solid, well-organized portfolio and nurture key accounts Partner with other Sales Representatives to share best practices, key business insights and industry trends     Requirements     Your expertise in a nutshell: 1 - 3 years Sales experience in the Payments industry Solid network of potential prospects and partners Tech-savvy, with a passion for Technology Solid business acumen and awareness of financial factors Exceptional communication, negotiation skills and techniques Highly organized and able to prioritize shifting workloads and responsibilities effectively Advance in Spanish and English, any additional language appreciated Superior oral and written communication skills and ability to communicate confidently at all levels Ability to work in cross-functional teams Excellent self-motivation and proactivity Data driven decision taken Technologic background/knowledge will be highly appreciated Working closely with internal and external merchants to ensure an effective alignment with business and clients' needs Based on objectives driven, prioritization and planification of workload is important Well organized, flexible and agile person     Interested? Keep on reading!     Benefits     Some of the perks of working with us:     Competitive salary Full-time, permanent contract Private health insurance 25 days of holiday + your birthday off Flexible vacation time (no blackout days) Flextime (7 - 09.30h / 15:30 - 18h) Free Friday afternoons (a 7-hour workday!) 35-hour week for the full month of July & August (free afternoons!) Work from home Other benefits paid from the gross salary (ticket restaurant, transport tickets, nursery tickets) Permanent internal training + Annual budget for external training Team-building activities Monthly afterwork Free coffee and snacks Free fresh fruit Games room (Nintendo, table tennis, futbolín) Terrace at the office An innovative approach to all internal processes and businesses Work with the latest technologies + career progress opportunities     Equal Employment Opportunity Employer     Leadtech is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) Employer, which means we encourage applications from people with different backgrounds, interests, and personal circumstances. Our team welcomes applicants regardless of their race, gender, age, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, and/or disabilities. All we need is your high energy, skills, and willingness to be part of a great project!     Hiring process     First step: 20-minute phone interview to get to know you     Second step: On-site interview with HR and your future manager to talk about the position and how we approach work.     Third step: HR’s timely response regarding the status of your application and/or a second interview     Sounds good? Apply now!     We’re looking forward to meeting you.     Location     You'll have the flexibility to choose whether you'd like to come to the office every day, from time to time, or work fully remote. We want you to find the best combination for you.     If you prefer to be surrounded with amazing people, our exceptional office is in Barcelona's Blue Building, located right on the city's seafront. Besides our stunning views, you'll enjoy our office perks such as free fruit, snacks, and coffee and you'll also be able to take part in our Mario Kart and table tennis competitions.     The personal data you provide will be used to manage your candidacy for the corporate selection processes that fit your profile. If you wish, you can exercise your rights of access, rectification or cancellation by sending a letter to Avenida Litoral, 12-14, 5ta planta, Barcelona 08005, or emailing us at protecciondedatos@LeadTech.com, including a document that validates your identity.

Title: Ethical Hacker Junior
Description: Cuidar de las personas y empresas para hacer del mundo un lugar más seguro manteniéndonos a la vanguardia de la innovación es lo que nos motiva desde hace más de 40 años.     Y lo hacemos utilizando las tecnologías más punteras (IA IoT Data Science Blockchange etc.) para ofrecer soluciones disruptivas a través de nuestras cinco líneas de negocio Security Cash Alarms Cipher y AVOS.     Como un verdadero equipo nuestros más de 150.000 profesionales han conseguido posicionarnos como un referente a nivel global en el sector de la seguridad privada estando presentes en más de 25 países.     La innovación y la capacidad para transformarnos forman parte de nuestro ADN y compartimos tres valores que nos caracterizan Nos importan las personas pensamos en positivo y somos imparables.     Cipher es una empresa global de ciberseguridad que presta una amplia variedad de servicios. Entre sus clientes se encuentran desde empresas de tamaño medio hasta empresas de fama internacional y agencias gubernamentales con innumerables casos de éxito.     ¿Y tú? ¿Te sientes identificado con nuestro propósito? ¿Te apasionan los retos y quieres llevar tu carrera profesional a otro nivel? Hoy tienes la oportunidad de hacerlo sumándote a nuestro Team of Teams como Cybersecurity Presales / Ingeniero preventa.     Necesitamos una persona con inquietudes técnicas que le guste estar siempre actualizado en las tendencias del mercado y nuevas soluciones de ciberseguridad y que le quiera aceptar el desafío de aprender continuamente ante nuevos proyectos. Riguroso en el trabajo y enfocado a la venta y al trato con clientes.     ¿Cuáles serían tus funciones?     Participar en el despliegue administración y operación de herramientas de pentesting. Ejecución de auditorías de seguridad o tests de intrusión.Proporcionar Ejecución de retests. Elaboración de informes.     ¿Qué buscamos de ti?     Grado en Ingeniería Informática o Telecomunicaciones. Pasión por la ciberseguridad y el hacking ético. Conocimientos de vulnerabilidades. Conocimientos en administración Linux/Windows. Conocimientos de Kali Linux y sus herramientas (Burp Suite Metasploit nmap etc.). Conocimientos en programación. Buena base de redes TCP/IP. Buena capacidad de redacción de informes. Conocimiento de la metodología OWASP. B2 Inglés     Valorable     Conocimiento de otras metodologías y frameworks de security testing. Programación en Python y/o Bash Scripting. Cualquier habilidad o conocimiento adicional de Hacking Ético. Certificaciones relacionadas con Hacking Ético nivel básico (eJPT o similares). Conocimientos en administración cloud (AWS/Azure).     Linux, windows, Burp suite, metasploit, nmap, python, bash scripting     a0101f95420cf3620b40

Title: Técnico de sistemas N2

Monitorización y mantenimiento de recursos y servicios en entornos de Cloud proveedores Hiperescalares (Microsoft Azure Amazon Web Services) y Cloud Service Providers. Title: Junior C++ Developer
Description: En Voovio nos dedicamos a desarrollar réplicas digitales 3D fotorrealistas de plantas petroquímicas de reconocidas empresas. Gestión de carrera profesional a medida. Trabajo remoto 100%. Formación interna y externa a medida.     Requisitos Indispensables:     Buscamos ingenieros software, de telecomunicaciones, industriales, ciclos formativos de informática, o similares, a los que les apasionen las tecnologías de la información. Experiencia inferior a 3 años en programación con C++. Perfiles resolutivos, analíticos y metódicos. Ganas de aprender y trabajar en un equipo joven. Buen nivel de inglés (B1 mínimo recomendable en el marco europeo).     Requisitos deseables:     Experiencia con sistemas de gestión de versiones: Git. Experiencia con el entorno de desarrollo Qt Creator. Experiencia usando distintos IDE de testing. Conocimientos de programación C++ / C#. Conocimiento de la herramienta QtCreator. Conocimiento de metodologías ágiles.     ¿Sientes que no cumples con todos los requisitos? En Voovio creemos firmemente que el desarrollo profesional se produce a través de la instrucción y el aprendizaje continuo de tus compañeros.     Incluso si no estás seguro de contar con toda la experiencia que buscamos, te invitamos a presentar tu candidatura si esta posición despierta tu curiosidad.     Estaremos encantados de considerar tu solicitud y explorar las posibilidades de desarrollo conjunto en en nuestra compañía.     Powered by JazzHR     zFDpIETp1a

Title: Senior UA / Admon Manager
Description: Carry1st is Africa’s leading publisher of mobile games and digital content. Operating at the intersection of games, fintech, and web3, we scale awesome content in frontier markets by solving hard problems. We develop, licence, and publish games and monetize them effectively with our proprietary platform. We are backed by blue-chip investors like: Andreessen Horowitz, Google, Riot Games, Bitkraft, and Nas.     As Senior UA / Admon Manager, Games you will be responsible for user acquisition for multiple games, establishing our multi-channel strategy while optimizing for performance. You will also be responsible for optimizing the ad waterfalls for these games in order to drive solid acquisition. Reporting to our Head of UA/Monetization, you’ll work closely with our Creative, Data, Growth, and Product teams to own and scale this central part of our ambitious growth strategy.     You will...     +4 years experience of in-house or marketing agency experience with a proven track record of scaling paid media channels for a mobile gaming app Experience in ad operations on Applovin MAX or Ironsource, setting up and optimizing waterfalls for different tiers and geos, AB testing, and setting up capping and pacing Highly analytical – comfortable analyzing and interpreting complex sets of information and communicating recommendations in a clear, effective way. SQL and Python / R knowledge a huge plus Understanding of full-funnel marketing strategies and applicable KPI's     Requirements     4+ years experience of in-house or marketing agency experience with a proven track record of scaling paid media channels for a mobile gaming app Experience in ad operations on Applovin MAX or Ironsource, setting up and optimizing waterfalls for different tiers and geos, AB testing, and setting up capping and pacing Highly analytical – comfortable analyzing and interpreting complex sets of information and communicating recommendations in a clear, effective way. SQL and Python / R knowledge a huge plus Understanding of full-funnel marketing strategies and applicable KPI's Hyper-organized, detail-oriented, self-motivated     Benefits     Carry1st is a fast-growing, dynamic place to work. And while we are laser focused on building the flagship mobile internet company in Africa, our team is fully remote and 100% global - with people in 25+ countries! At Carry1st, you will…     Build awesome, industry-changing products, every day Grow with a VC-backed startup at the intersection of gaming, fintech, and web3 Work from anywhere in the world with international teammates Own shares in the Company - enabling you to benefit from the value you create     Some additional perks…     Co-working excursions: Travel to meet your colleagues in cities around the world Awesome equipment: Get everything you need to work effectively Remote working allowance: Put an additional $600 / year to optimise your WFH experience Learning and development: Attend courses, conferences and training events Social events: Participate in regular company events to relax and connect with teammates Birthday leave: Enjoy a paid day off on your special day     We hire great people from a wide variety of backgrounds, not just because it's the right thing to do, but because it makes our company stronger. Join us!     Learn more about Carry1st…     Andreessen Horowitz shared why they invested in Carry1st VentureBeat announced that Carry1st has raised $27 million to develop and publish mobile games in Africa Remerge hosted Cordel on a podcast to discuss Carry1st and the African gaming market

Title: Fullstack (Teletrabajo) - España
Description: En Rawson BPO, estamos en búsqueda de un/a FULLSTACK (TELETRABAJO)     Rol     Fullstack (Teletrabajo)     Requisitos     Necesarios: React, Node.js, MySQL, NestJS, Redux, JavaScript, TypeScript, desarrollo de APIs y conocimiento de arquitecturas SOA y/o de microservicios. Deseables: Flutter, InfluxDB, Cloud computing, patrones de diseño, SOLID y DevOps.     Condiciones     Contrato Indefinido. Salario a convenir. Modo de trabajo: Remoto 100%.     ¡Te estamos esperando!
Industry: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI

Title: Asistente estratégico / Junior Project Manager
Description: En Rhenus Logistics buscamos incorporar un/a "Asistente estratégico / Junior Project Manager" en España (Madrid, Barcelona o Mallorca), cuya misión principal será darle soporte al CFO de nuestra unidad de negocio Overland Transport.  Formaras parte de un equipo internacional y podrás liderar proyectos internacionales en poco tiempo.  Principales funciones a desarrollar:  Apoyar al CFO en la implementación de proyectos estratégicos con enfoque internacional Realizar analisis basados en datos, creando estadísticas y calculando casos de negocio Apoyar a las unidades de negocio dentro de la división Overland Transport Preparación y seguimiento de diferentes reuniones   Se ofrece:  Contrato indefinido Teletrabajo Horario de 08:30 a 17:30 de lunes a viernes Posición con mucha visibilidad, posibilidad de rápido crecimiento en la empresa   RHENUS ROAD SPAIN es un empleador que ofrece igualdad de oportunidades. Todas las personas tendrán la oportunidad de ser consideradas para el empleo sin importar su raza, color, religión, origen nacional, ascendencia, ciudadanía, edad, sexo, género, identidad de género, expresión de género, orientación sexual, estado civil, discapacidad, embarazo, parto y condiciones médicas relacionadas, o cualquier otra característica protegida por las leyes aplicables. Rhenus se esforzará por realizar una adaptación razonable a las limitaciones físicas o mentales conocidas de un solicitante calificado con una discapacidad, a menos que la adaptación imponga una dificultad excesiva en el funcionamiento de nuestro negocio.  Requisitos:  Dominio paquete Office (Outlook, Word, Excel) Inglés fluido (C1). Estudios de grado o máster en finanzas o ADE Disponibilidad para viajar un 30/40% del tiempo Al menos 1 año de experiencia en puestos similares

Title: Product Research & Innovation Intern
Description: We are now a team of more than 300 highly passionate individuals coming from all over the world. Together, we have established Clarity AI as a leading startup backed by investors and strategic partners such as SoftBank, BlackRock, and Deutsche Börse who believe in us and share our goals. We have plans to continue growing our teams in Spain, Portugal, the UK, and the US this year so if you would like to join us on this rocket ship, keep reading! Your work will be shaping and guide the sustainable decisions of consumers and investors throughout the world.[Important before reading the offer]     We are looking for a person without or very little experience, in the last year of university or recently graduated.     Our musts for this position     Complying with at least one of the following conditions: Be able to do an internship agreement with your school You have never been subject to a "Contrato de Prácticas" before Being able to work as a full-time employee in June 2023 the latest (You could be promoted to full-time employee in 3 months if you perform really well) Being authorized to work in Spain Having good quantitative skills. Large datasets and coding is part of our day-to-day Having a minimum C1 English level. We communicate in English all the time     For you, it is a must to:     Have a positive impact with your job Work with a team of empathetic and assertive people Work in an international and team-working environment Have continuous feedback from your team     If you resonate with this, please keep reading.     The Company – Clarity AI     At Clarity AI, we are committed to bringing social impact to markets. We are a tech company started in 2017, leveraging AI and machine learning technologies to ensure environmental, social and governance dimensions are the focal point of decision making within financial markets.     We are now a team of more than 300 highly passionate individuals coming from all over the world. Together, we have established Clarity AI as a leading startup backed by investors and strategic partners such as SoftBank, BlackRock, and Deutsche Börse who believe in us and share our goals. We have plans to continue growing our teams in Spain, Portugal, the UK, and the US this year so if you would like to join us on this rocket ship, keep reading! Your work will be shaping and guide the sustainable decisions of consumers and investors throughout the world.     Internship Overview     We’re looking for an individual to join our research team and help us solve challenges across our different modules.     Some of the potential questions that you could work on include:     Review company-level sustainability issues including environmental, social and corporate governance practices and synthesize these findings into broader frameworks Procur, verify and process data on sustainability by browsing through various financial, exchange and government regulator websites and materials. Assess trade-offs between different methodological options to calculate indicators and propose the most appropriate solution for our ratings Identify and propose improvements and refinements to the methodology     Requirements     QUALIFICATIONS:     Deeply passionate about social impact Outstanding quantitative and critical thinking skills Self-starter who will thrive in a start-up setting by taking ownership and initiative Experience in the financial sector and/or experience with Python or R will be a plus. Complete fluency in English (minimum C1)     LOCATION: Remote in Spain or from the office in Madrid/Barcelona. Of course you can do both.     Benefits     What we offer     Our people are our main asset. We have built a unique team and we all share 3 differential aspects: Excellence, Passion and Values:     Our team comprises professionals from leading consulting and banking firms, MBA graduates from top business schools, entrepreneurs and PhDs Clarity AI’s Founder and CEO, Rebeca Minguela, is a successful entrepreneur who has been recognized as one of the most distinguished leaders under the age of 40 by prestigious institutions like the World Economic Forum     We are different. We work hard to become the best place to work and pride ourselves on our culture:     Fact based: Promoting objective, fact-based and solution-oriented discussions Diverse: Encouraging diversity of personalities, cultures and experiences Transparent: Communicating feedback transparently, constructively and in real-time Meritocratic: Striving for excellence and rewarding the best Flexible: Working flexibly in the broadest sense (schedule, location, vacation, styles)     Clarity AI believes diversity, inclusion, and belonging are essential for creating an innovative and successful workplace. Thats why we created our own ERG groups.     Our own ERG groups act as a voluntary employee resource group, they commit to promoting these values and creating a safe and supportive community for all employees. They are committed to creating a workplace that champions sustainability, diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI).     To do this, they will advocate for sustainability initiatives, host and participate in events, workshops, provide a safe space for employees to share their experiences, ideas, and solutions, and collaborate with other departments and employee groups to improve the company's sustainability goals.     By actively promoting and engaging in sustainability efforts, we can help create a more equitable and resilient future for our planet and all its inhabitants.     We care about our employees and think they deserve the best.     Remote benefits: We offer remote working flexibility and provide everyone with a budget in setting up the best workspace that meets their needs Additional benefits are available depending on your location     We are a US company with Spanish and British subsidiaries. We have amazing offices in Madrid, London and New York City.     Clarity has received several awards:     Fast Company - Most Innovative Companies 2023 WEF, Young Global Leader - Rebeca Minguela Forrester New Wave Leader 2022 European Commission | EU Seal of Excellence 2020 World Economic Forum - Technology Pioneer 2020     keywords: engineer, mathematics, physics, economics, sustainability, climate, data, analytics, research     palabras clave: ingeniero, ingeniera, matemáticas, física, economía, sostenibilidad, clima, datos, investigación

Title: Business Developer
Description: About us:     Codurance is a leading IT professional services consultancy, helping clients in continuously delivering value through the adoption of quality practices and expertise. We are growing and want to expand our sales team!     To summarise:     Growing Software Professionals Purposeful Software Quality A Lasting Positive Impact     We have a culture of continuous learning which means that our people are continually progressing, while our clients are provided with teams that have the complete skill sets required.     We endeavour to provide sustainable software that stands the test of time, but also has a positive impact for both our people and our clients - high-quality software that our teams enjoy working on, and is secure and easy to use for clients.     The Role     We are looking for a Business Developer!     You will join an already established and fast-growing company and will be responsible for driving new business. You will be networking with key decision-makers, driving sales processes, and drawing on the expertise of our business.     You will be collaborating closely with various Codurance teams: tech delivery, marketing, professional services and operations.     We are looking for someone who is able to apply the “consultative solution selling” methodology based on delivery and outcomes to achieve revenue goals. A consultative and professional approach to business development; gaining credibility with client partners by holding insight-driven conversations.     Responsibilities:     Identifying and qualifying leads/opportunities at prospective clients Managing the whole sales cycles (including crafting proposals) Building and sustaining multi-level relationships and selling Representing Codurance's brand Supporting, executing, and providing input into our sales strategy, and keeping our CRM system up to date (Hubspot)     We are mainly working remotely however due to the nature of this role there would also be visiting clients involved, across the Spanish territory depending on where our clients are based.     Requirements     We'd love to hear from you if you have:     5-10 years of experience selling professional services (technology, consultancy, software delivery) Experience selling solutions to scale up, mid-market and enterprise customers (not Saas) Good understanding of the technology industry (particularly modern technology and Agile) Proficiency in Spanish and English     Benefits     Transparency - all of our salary bandings and company finances are available to everyone from day one Autonomy - got an idea? Form an Initiative Circle, take ownership, run with it, and see it through to delivery Our People - You’ll be working alongside Craftspeople who share your interest in learning, whether that’s on a client project or contributing to our internal projects Personal Learning Budget - Access to Learnerbly, our online learning & development tool, to support your personal development and career progression here Training - No fixed training budget. So long as the course is relevant for the company and you'll do a lightning talk on the subject, we’re happy to pay for it Books - Found something interesting to read that doesn’t already live in our office or digital library? We’ll cover book expenses - and ask to read it after you as well! Private medical and dental insurance Ticket restaurants (retribución flexible) Gym discounts     Everyone should have the right to bring their whole self to work and be celebrated for who they are. Our people are hired purely on their commitment to these values and their ambition to deliver outstanding results for our clients. Codurance is proud to be an Equal Opportunities Employer and is committed to fostering an inclusive workplace.

Title: Global Head of IT Excellence (Madrid based)
Description: Description of the position:  The focus for this position is to lead the Global IT Operational Excellence team and support the CIO agenda both across IT and the organization by growing relationships with these stakeholders.  Key Responsibilities and tasks:  Orchestrate governance mechanisms ensuring that the appropriate decisions are made to implement the IT and business strategy. Define, maintain and report on the metrics that will be followed to track the progress of IT achievements such as IT budgeting & financial management, IT performance management & measurement, IT portfolio management and contract & license management. Design and maintain guiding principles for ways of working, organizational change management, IT marketing & communication to successfully execute organizational transformation. Work through virtual networks within Global IT and relevant stakeholder to be an integral part of the development process and include people from the operative organization who contribute to validation and outcomes. Drive the process to implement and maintain an IT operating model, IT processes and tools, following agile and lean principles. Ensure cost effective IT services and the management of the financial lifecycle of the global IT organization. Manage the IT Project portfolio of the global IT organization by implementing a business value driven selection process of IT initiatives while overseeing the execution of the IT project portfolio. Identify and initiate digital transformation "lighthouse" projects.  Working Experience:  At least 10-15 years of relevant work experience by line or project responsibility in (IT) strategy in an international environment, strong conceptual thinking and technological understanding. You already have significant experience in leading an international team. With strong communication skills as well as intercultural competence you can expand your skill set. You have strategic and conceptual skills to drive new topics in a fast and continuously changing environment and you are characterized by a strong ambition to establish new creative and innovative approaches in a global company. You can independently create organizational structures and are an innovative and analytical type who can inspire others with new ideas and approaches.  Job location:Madrid, European nationality otherwise EU/Spain work permit required as a prerequisite. Remote work allowed but not 100% remote.  Expected travel:  Frequent short trips on weekdays, mostly to Switzerland/Germany and other European countries.  Education and Training:  University degree or equivalent on Technical College or relevant related experience.  Languages:  English:Very good Business English required (at least B1/B2). Spanish:Business fluent (at least B1).  Organizational position:Reporting to the Global CIO (placed in Switzerland)  Employment Type:Permanent Full Time.  Salary:Depending on experience and value provided.  The Company:our customer is a Swiss/German multinational company (DORMAKABA) that operates all over the world for more than 150 years and is one of the leading providers of innovative security and access solutions for selected segments of the fast-growing security industry. More than 16,000 employees and around 2.000 M€ revenue. This company maintains its worldwide technology leadership by constantly investing in innovation and product development. They will hire the selected candidate as an internal and permanent employee, based in Madrid, but providing services to their global internal organisation.  If you are interested, please apply here or send an email to excellence@montarelo.com including in the subject: ‘IT Excellence (Madrid)’ along with your CV.
Function: Gestión y Tecnología de la información

Title: AGENTE TELEFÓNICO TELETRABAJO CAMPAÑA
Description: Desde MARLEX HUMAN CAPITAL estamos buscando gente con ganas de trabajar, gente extrovertida y con sonrisa telefónica, para realizar funciones como teleoperador/a en una campaña a nivel nacional para una empresa dedicada al sector de la automoción. Experiencia en atención al cliente. Manejo fluido de ordenador. Indispensable equipo: ordenador (ningún otro dispositivo es válido), sistema operativo WINDOWS, cascos CON MICRO, WIFI estable. Disponibilidad horaria jornada completa (10 a 19h.). Dotes comerciales Se valoran conocimientos básicos sector automoción (marcas, modelos). Disponibilidad inmediata Indiferente localización dentro del territorio nacional.

Title: Senior Project Leader in Health (Remoto)
Description: ¿Estás buscando una nueva oportunidad que ayude a lanzar tu carrera? ¿Te gustaría trabajar para una de las consultoras más grandes a nivel mundial? Sigue leyendo porque esto es para ti.  Que están buscando:  Buscan un Project Lead con experiencia desarrollando proyectos sobre Salud de entre 5 y 10 años posteriores al graduado.  ¿Qué valoran?  Que sus trabajadores sean resolutivos frente a posibles problemas Que sean líderes de equipo eficaces y que aporten motivación a los demás compañeros Capacidad de organización y autonomía Fluidez con el inglés en cuanto a habilidades de comunicación oral y escrita.   ¿Cómo te compensaran?  Acceso a posibilidades de capacitaciones, evaluaciones anuales de desempeño y un programa de mentoría Equilibrio y flexibilidad entre la vida laboral y personal Ambiente multicultural Se recompensara por traer a contactos que tengan talento   NOTA: Para estas vacantes sólo podremos considerar a candidatos que tengan permiso de trabajo vigente y en regla, o bien nacionalidad española o de la Unión Europea.¿Qué te parece la posición? ¿Crees que puedes encajar en el equipo? Si es así inscríbete y muy pronto contactaremos contigo.  ¡Te esperamos!  Requisitos:  El candidato perfecto debe tener conocimientos de:  Experiencia práctica en un sector específico de la industria de la salud como; ensayos clínicos, farmacovigilancia, cadena de suministro, dispositivos médicos, etc. Que tengan marcos y sistemas TI para coordinar el sistema de salud, tanto a nivel nacional como regional Sistemas informáticos que mejoren la gestión de la salud pública Comprensión clara de los problemas de alineación de negocios/TI en entornos internacionales complejos Además, de contar con un grado universitario en Business, Ingeniería, Computer Science Health, Biomedicina o similares

Title: Project Manager
Description: Who We Are     Solera is a global leader in data and software services that strives to transform every touchpoint of the vehicle lifecycle into a connected digital experience. In addition, we provide products and services to protect life’s other most important assets: our homes and digital identities. Today, Solera processes over 300 million digital transactions annually for approximately 235,000 partners and customers in more than 90 countries. Our 6,500 team members foster an uncommon, innovative culture and are dedicated to successfully bringing the future to bear today through cognitive answers, insights, algorithms and automation. For more information, please visit solera.com.     The Role     We are looking for a virtual Project Manager to drive companywide high-visibility and high-priority IT Programs. This important hire must have exceptional communication and organization skills, be highly collaborative, and have a deep understanding of independent and interdependent IT organizational structures, tools, and teams. With an emphasis on discovery and soft skills, this individual will work with leadership and teams across the globe to create meaningful and positive change. Pragmatic, innovative, data driven, detail oriented, and self-motivated are skills crucial to the success of this role as well as the ability to leverage and implement program management tools, processes and KPIs to increase visibility, create stability, and ensure success. The ideal candidate will be accountable for key programs and will coordinate the logistics and resources, conduct planning and working sessions, and build lasting relationships to meet program objectives.     What You’ll Do     As the Project Manager, you will work directly with Product, Development, and IT leadership to kick-off, oversee, and manage key programs. You will collaboratively define the scope of work, identify appropriate resources, set goals, develop schedules, and track and report progress while ensuring that the overall approach is refined and can be leveraged by junior Program and Project Managers. Along with managing key programs, you will:     Drive implementation of multiple, complex program management initiatives, working closely with cross-functional teams and resources to achieve milestones within established timeframes Communicate with project stakeholders, and executive and senior management, and provide reporting insights on issues through root cause analyses Set and continually manage program expectations with team members and other stakeholders Coach, mentor, motivate, and supervise program team members and contractors, and influence them to take positive action and take accountability for their assigned work     What You’ll Bring     Bachelor's degree (B.A.) or equivalent work experience. 10+ yrs experience of program or project management 7+ yrs experience creating and driving large scale technology and data-driven program management transformation plans Advanced knowledge of business applications such as Microsoft Word, Excel and Project, Teams, etc.     Demonstrated ability to:     Proactively and effectively communicate and present ideas in a clear and persuasive manner to all organization levels. Persuade, encourage, enroll, and motivate others.   Work collaboratively at all levels within the organization. Plan, prioritize, and quickly adapt to overcome obstacles and resource constraints to ensure objectives achieved. Develop strategies, action plans, and metrics to ensure visibility, proactively identify risks, and have the objective information to address issues. Quickly identify problems and create mitigation plans to minimize risk, issues, bottlenecks, and obstacles. Be accountable, trustworthy, transparent, and dependable. Have a high-level of emotional intelligence, self-regulation, and self-control so that you can adapt to ensure success even in stressful or difficult situations.
Function: Gestión y Tecnología de la información
Industry: Servicios y tecnologías de la información

Title: Delivery Manager Táctico (*)
Description: En BETWEEN apostamos por el mejor talento dentro del sector tecnológico. Nos involucramos en una gran variedad de proyectos punteros, trabajando con las últimas tecnologías. Actualmente en BETWEEN contamos con un equipo de más de 800 personas.  Trabajamos en ámbitos como BI, IoT, Big Data e I+D. En el área de Operaciones implantamos proyectos de Service Desk, Infraestructuras IT y proyectos Cloud, entre otros.  Actualmente seleccionamos un/a Delivery Manager Táctico para incorporarse en un proyecto estable de forma indefinida en uno de nuestros clientes del sector textil.  La persona seleccionada trabajará en remoto y acompañará a los equipos asegurando la entrega de valor y la productividad de los mismos.  ¿Qué haré? Estas serán tus funciones principales:  Gestionar eficazmente las entregas de los productos dentro de marco ágil, liderando a su equipo de desarrollo en un entorno con arquitectura basada en microservicios.  ¿Cómo lo haré? Tendrás a tu alcance:  Tendrás que ayudarte de un enfoque ágil, normalmente a nivel equipo trabajamos con SCRUM con sprints de 2 semanas. Acompañamiento de POs en orientación a aporte de valor y el uso de datos para priorizar y toma de decisiones. Acompañamiento de TLs en la búsqueda de la excelencia técnica y en el liderazgo de equipos, desde el acompañamiento y liderando con el ejemplo.   ¿Con quién lo voy a hacer?:  Trabajarás dentro del equipo de plataforma core de Ecommerce. Acompañando a equipos ya existentes del dominio de Stock en su paso a IOP. Trabajarás con un equipo de Delivery Managers de la misma unidad organizativa.   Además, trabajando para BETWEEN obtendrás los siguientes beneficios añadidos:  Seguro médico incluido por ser Betweener Posibilidad de formar parte de una empresa en pleno crecimiento a nivel nacional e internacional. Un buen lugar donde trabajar: cuidamos de nuestro equipo y la sociedad a través de iniciativas, programas de conciliación y de responsabilidad social corporativa Te integrarás en un equipo de alto rendimiento y con un alto grado de especialización. Dispondrás de oportunidades de formación y desarrollo profesional Pondremos a tu disposición un amplio abanico de retos y proyectos acordes con tus objetivos personales y profesionales. Posibilidad de elegir cómo obtener parte de tu salario gracias a las ventajas fiscales de nuestra Retribución Flexible, y descuentos para acceder a centros de fitness, entre otros En BETWEEN, la igualdad de oportunidades es uno de nuestros valores. Nuestro compromiso es contratar al mejor talentos independientemente de su raza, religión, sexo, edad y personas con otras capacidades y promover su desarrollo profesional y personal.   Requisitos:  Imprescindible:  Experiencia trabajando con equipos ágiles y conocimiento de frameworks asociados: SCRUM, Kanban, XP (la experiencia como Scrum Master o Coach Agile es muy valorable). Experiencia en la gestión del ciclo de vida de proyectos / productos. Experiencia en gestión de equipos (people management) en proyectos de desarrollo de software. Experiencia demostrable en la resolución de problemas, riesgos y dependencias en entorno iterativos y cambiantes conformados por múltiples equipos.   Muy valorable:  Experiencia gestionando problemas en el ciclo de desarrollo del software; (CI/CD, gestión repositorios, QA strategy…). Experiencia previa trabajando con objetivos y resultados clave (OKRs). Experiencia trabajando con equipos "orientados al producto". Comprensión de las prácticas y técnicas modernas de desarrollo de software (por ejemplo, TDD, BDD, DDD, API First).
Function: Gestión y Tecnología de la información

Title: Prácticas - Consultor Protección de Datos
Description: Somos expertos en identificar y generar eficiencias en los procesos de otras empresas. ¡Somo líderes de la Transformación eficiente!     En pfs trabajamos en un entorno de trabajo flexible, joven, dinámico y en continuo crecimiento. Primamos el bienestar de nuestro talento interno, por eso priorizamos la conciliación de la vida laboral y personal confiando en nuestros trabajadores y en sus capacidades para sacar a flote las metas que entre todos llevemos a cabo.     Actualmente estamos ubicados en España, Portugal y México.     Ventajas De Trabajar En Pfs     Retribución Flexible (Comida, transporte, seguro privado y guarderías). Eventos corporativos y red social corporativa Descuentos en Clínicas Dentales y Restaurantes (Madrid). Ventajas y descuentos de empleados Conciliación familiar. Programa específico de onboarding en la empresa. Modalidad de trabajo eWORK basado en Objetivos.     Gracias a nuestro modelo de trabajo eWORK, podrás disfrutar de una flexibilidad horaria y conciliación con la vida personal al mismo tiempo que persigues los objetivos comunes de la empresa.     Las Características Principales De Este Puesto     Conocer el negocio: Este puesto permitirá a la persona conseguir adquirir conocimientos legales, obteniendo un conocimiento profundo de todas las operaciones y procesos en pfslegal. Al trabajar en estrecha colaboración con diferentes equipos, podrá comprender en detalle cómo funciona la empresa y contribuir al éxito general. Trabajo en remoto y dinámico: Esta posición ofrece la posibilidad de trabajar de forma remota y flexible desde cualquier punto de la geografía española. Además, la naturaleza dinámica del trabajo asegura que cada día sea diferente y que se presente una amplia gama de desafíos y oportunidades de aprendizaje.     ¿Quieres ser parte de la empresa líder en plataformas digitales para la transformación eficiente?. ¡Únete a nosotr@s!     Requisitos     Conocimientos en derecho, administrativos, informática (nivel usuario avanzado), Formado en gestión comercial. Con conocimientos en derecho, no siendo imprescindible que sea licenciada en derecho. Formación mínima necesaria: FP Convenio de formación / prácticas.     Requisitos Valorables. Se Busca Una Persona     Resolutiva, creativa y organizada, con espíritu de sacrificio, que anteponga la consecución de los objetivos comunes y la visión global de equipo a sus comodidades e intereses individuales. Resiliente, comprometida y empática. Que sepa trabajar en equipo y genere un buen ambiente laboral. Abierta a aprender, con buena actitud ante la necesidad de recibir dirección. Disciplinada y con capacidad para considerar la experiencia y conocimientos que los demás tienen.     Tareas a Desempeñar     Comercial, atención al cliente, gestión de recibos devueltos, informática (usuario avanzado), gestión de clientes.

Title: Customer Success Manager- EMEA
Description: Make Your Mark     Cymulate's Continuous Security Validation enables companies to challenge, assess and optimize their cyber-security posture against the evolving cyberthreat landscape, simply and continuously.     With world-class clients like YMCA, Brinks, and EuroNext we strive to bring the highest level of service to everything we do. Our team is made up of the very best people for the job and as we grow, we're always on the lookout for people with the skills, experience, and personality that will let us both shine. With high scores on Gartner and Glassdoor, our clients and employees have let us know what they love about us.     The Customer Success Manager (CSM) will manage a portfolio of clients through the lifecycle; driving adoption and outcomes leading to renewals, expansion of product offerings, and advocacy across their platform and throughout the client journey. The CSM represents their client to internal stakeholders whilst identifying opportunities to increase value for their clients.     RESPONSIBILITIES:     Onboarding new clients and collecting asset data. Effectively capture client business requirements and ensure a successful, timely configuration of client portal. Training clients on the platform and work with clients to identify and trouble shoot issues or challenges with client platform usage. Act as a liaison between internal teams to ensure customer needs are being met, coordinating amongst Sales, Product and Engineering teams. Identify risks and drive maximum product value for clients. Analyze and monitor client data to realize insights and optimizations and communicate those findings to the client. Work with internal stakeholders to support and drive successful renewals. Maintain client records in Salesforce. Proactively manage client relationship; meet with clients on a regular basis to obtain feedback on our product, identify opportunities for improvements, assess utilization, build plans for maximum optimization, ensure Cymulate meeting business and security goals and objectives. Develop and maintain a deep understanding of client needs and drivers and align Cymulate's technology to support those needs.     QUALIFICATIONS:     Spanish fluency Proactive, positive, self-starter, with strong organizational skills. Strong empathy for clients with a can-do, problem solver attitude. Demonstrated ability to research and cultivate business relationships with key executives and contacts. High emotional intelligence and analytically inclined. Ability to work in a team based, collaborative environment with a passion for contributing to a first-class customer success function. Ability to influence internal stakeholders and drive relevant customer enhancement requests. Track record of working in a customer facing, cyber security environment. Experience in CRM systems, preferably Salesforce. Demonstrable competency in thinking strategically and, executing tactically while providing reliable, high level client satisfaction and retention. Ability to work in a fast-paced, startup environment. Ability to multitask and wear multiple "hats". Capability to communicate products and services effectively to clients and partners. Experience in training adult learners on cyber security technology. Bachelor's Degree or 5 years' experience in Computer Science or relevant field. Experience in SaaS environments, specifically in customer success.     **Please note, applicants outside of the United Kingdom will only be subject to employment as consultants**
